title_en: Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC32 - Shiny Black
title_ar: ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙÙ„ ÙƒÙ„Ø± FC32 - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ù„Ø§Ù…Ø¹
description_en:
Unleash your bold and artistic side with **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC32**. This shiny black enamel will give your nails a unique and daring touch, whether they are short or long. It provides rich color and exceptional shine with every stroke. Featuring a unique chip-resistant formula and quick-drying properties, along with a thick brush for easy and professional application. Make your look stand out in harmony with your favorite outfits and silver jewelry.

â­ Trendy and rich colors with just one stroke.
â­ Unique technology stops chipping.
â­ Gives a shiny and glossy finish on the nails.
â­ Convenient drying time.
â­ Eye-catchy black color.
â­ Thick brush for perfect coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC32**
â­ Clean your hands and shape your nail with a file.
â­ Remove old nail polish from the nails.
â­ Spend some time in clipping, buffing & shaping nails.
â­ Submerge your hands in warm soapy water.
â­ Dry it with a cloth.
â­ Moisturize your cuticles and nail skin with almond oil or any lotion.
â­ Apply a base coat to each nail. Let it dry properly.
â­ Apply one to three layers of nail polish. Allow all the layers to dry.
â­ Once done with that, apply the polish in three-strokes.
â­ Clean the spill-over strokes with cotton.
â­ Prefer to use some cuticle oil after painting.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Flormar Full Color Nail Enamel FC32**
â­ Enjoy the captivating black color and high shine.
â­ High-quality formula ensuring color durability and ease of application.
â­ Free from harmful substances, caring for your nail health.

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthier hair with **Foltene Pharma Strengthening Shampoo for Thinning Hair**. Specially formulated for thinning, weak, and fragile hair, this shampoo works to restore the natural equilibrium of both your hair and scalp, helping to boost thickness and volume. Enriched with ingredients that nourish and stimulate natural hair growth, **Foltene Pharma Strengthening Shampoo for Thinning Hair** revitalizes hair damaged by stress, poor diet, or colorants. Its unique formula restores the scalp's biological function without mixing with the bloodstream, making it safe to use even during pregnancy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Pharma Strengthening Shampoo for Thinning Hair**:
â­ Apply to damp hair and gently massage for 3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use three times a week or daily as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Pharma Strengthening Shampoo for Thinning Hair**:
â­ TRICALGOXYL: FoltÃ¨ne's patented active ingredient that strengthens thin hair and rebalances the scalp.
â­ PANAX GINSENG EXTRACT: Energizes hair, providing body and shine.
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate (SLES)-free formula for extra-delicate cleansing, preserving hair and scalp health.
â­ Free from parabens, mineral oil, silicones, and paraffin wax.

#Foltene #ThinningHairShampoo #HairLossTreatment #HealthyHair #HairCare #StrongHair #HairNourishment #SaudiHairCare #ShinyHair #ScalpHealth

**Foltene Eyelash & Eyebrow Enhancing Serum** is your ultimate solution for stronger, longer, and more voluminous lashes and brows. Designed for daily use, this serum significantly enhances your eye's appearance in just 45 days. Achieve your dream lashes with an advanced formula that strengthens hair follicles and boosts natural density, giving you a captivating and bold look.

**Product Benefits:**
â­ Achieve strong, long, and shiny lashes.
â­ Noticeable increase in lash density.
â­ Visible results within 45 days.
â­ Enhances the overall appearance of the eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Eyelash & Eyebrow Enhancing Serum**:
â­ Apply twice daily, once in the morning before makeup and once in the evening after makeup removal.
â­ Gently apply to the lash line and brows using the included applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Eyelash & Eyebrow Enhancing Serum**:
â­ Unique formula to promote lash and brow growth.
â­ Nourishing ingredients that strengthen hair follicles.
â­ Safe for use around the eye area.

description_en:
Discover the ultimate solution to combat hair loss with **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Ampoules for Women**. These innovative ampoules are specifically designed to strengthen your hair from root to tip, fighting thinning caused by environmental aggressors. Our unique formula replenishes nutrients and hydrates, fortifying your locks. **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Ampoules for Women** gently lifts away toxins from the scalp, restoring its natural physiological balance for enhanced hair health and a youthful, vibrant appearance.

With **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Ampoules for Women**, you'll experience a significant increase in hair quantity in the growing phase (Anagen) and can stop hair loss in just 30 days. It also decreases the amount of hair in the falling phase (Telogen) and increases hair length and resistance, giving it exceptional strength, volume, and shine. Enjoy the benefits of stopping hair loss in 30 days and achieving regrowth within 6 weeks, while delaying hair aging.

â­ Stops hair loss in 30 days.
â­ Promotes hair regrowth within 6 weeks.
â­ Increases hair length and resistance.
â­ Imparts strength, volume, and shine.
â­ Free from SLES, mineral oils, parabens, silicones, and paraffin wax.

Attack phase: 3 vials per week for two months.
Maintenance phase: 2 vials per week for 6 weeks.

Do not rinse after application.

description_en:
Experience the ultimate solution for dandruff with **Foltene Anti-Dandruff Shampoo**. This innovative shampoo is designed to be effective against all types of dandruff, whether dry or oily, and prevent its recurrence, giving you a healthy and clear scalp. **Foltene Anti-Dandruff Shampoo** helps to relieve scalp irritation and remove stubborn flakes, while also rebalancing natural oil production in oily scalps, restoring your hair's vitality and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Anti-Dandruff Shampoo**

â­ Wet your hair thoroughly and apply an adequate amount of shampoo.
â­ Gently massage the scalp for 3 minutes to allow the active ingredients to work.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat application 3 times a week during the intensive treatment period.
â­ For maintenance treatment, use once a week to prevent dandruff recurrence and hair loss.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Anti-Dandruff Shampoo**

â­ Salicylic Acid: Helps to remove flaky layers and soothes scalp irritation.
â­ Thyme Extract: Purifies the scalp and regulates sebum production, especially for oily dandruff.

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy, strong hair with **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Women**. This innovative treatment is specifically designed to boost your hair's density, combat hair loss, and restore scalp vitality. Thanks to its unique formula, **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Women** nourishes hair follicles from the roots, giving your hair a fuller, healthier appearance. Achieve your dream hair with this effective solution for hair loss.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Women**:
â­ Use one vial every other day for 8 weeks.
â­ Maintenance Phase: Use 2 vials per week for 6 weeks.
â­ The duration of the treatment depends on the results obtained.
â­ It is recommended to repeat the treatment at least twice a year, especially in spring and autumn.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Women**:
â­ TricalgoxylÂ®: Promotes thick, healthy, and strong hair, normalizing the hair's life cycle.
â­ DN-Ageâ„¢: A plant extract that protects the scalp and hair from environmental stress, oxidative stress, UV radiation, and premature aging.
â­ Nourishing Biomineral Complex: Extracted from algae, rich in essential minerals that revitalize the scalp and hair.
â­ Capillia Longa PPF: A new generation of plant extracts known for their antioxidant and regenerative properties.

description_en:
Experience the nourishing power of **Foltene Hair Revitalizing Conditioner 180 Ml**, the ultimate solution for dry and damaged hair.

This revitalizing conditioner is enriched with macadamia and pracaxi oils, vitamin E, and panthenol, providing deep hydration and superior nourishment for your hair. Its unique formula gently detangles hair, leaving it softer and easier to comb, while helping strands resist breakage. Enjoy healthy, shiny, and elastic hair with regular use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Hair Revitalizing Conditioner 180 Ml**:
â­ Apply the conditioner after shampooing, from mid-length to the ends.
â­ Leave on for a few minutes for deep conditioning.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Ideal for daily use on all hair types.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Hair Revitalizing Conditioner 180 Ml**:
â­ Macadamia Oil & Pracaxi Oil: Emollient and soothing properties to deeply condition, nourish, and add shine to hair.
â­ Vitamin E & Panthenol: With anti-oxidant & anti-aging action, they revitalize hair and help it feel and look smoother and less prone to breakage.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

description_en:
Introducing the ultimate solution for oily hair: **Foltene Sebum Regulator Shampoo 200ml**. Its innovative formula, enriched with Biotin (Vitamin B6) and natural Sage Extract, effectively controls sebum production without disrupting the scalp's natural protective barrier. Enjoy healthier, shinier, and cleaner hair for longer, with a noticeable improvement in appearance with every use.

â­ Gentle formula free from SLES, parabens, mineral oil, silicones, and paraffin wax for extremely gentle yet effective cleansing.
â­ Promotes hair health and restores its natural vitality.
â­ Leaves hair looking healthy and radiant for longer.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Sebum Regulator Shampoo 200ml**:
â­ Apply the shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage gently into the scalp for 3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ Suitable for daily use for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Sebum Regulator Shampoo 200ml**:
â­ VITAMIN B6 & BIOTIN: Help regulate sebum production in the hair and scalp.
â­ Sage Extract: Thanks to its revitalizing properties, it softens hair and invigorates the scalp.

description_en:
Say goodbye to hair loss with **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Men**, the ultimate solution for promoting healthy hair and scalp.

**Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Men** features an innovative formula combining active ingredients to stimulate hair growth, increase density, and strengthen hair from the roots.

â­ **TricosaccarideÂ®**: FoltÃ¨neÂ® PHARMA's exclusive active ingredient, a unique blend of natural mucopolysaccharides that stimulates and nourishes the scalp, promoting hair density and resistance.
â­ **DN-Ageâ„¢**: A natural extract from Cassia Alata plant that protects the scalp and hair from environmental stress, oxidative stress, UV radiation, and premature aging.
â­ **Revitalizing Nourishing Complex**: A blend of amino acids and vitamins (A, B5, PP, C, E) essential for hair and scalp health.
â­ **Capillia LongaPPF**: Advanced derivatives from Curcuma Longa, known for its antioxidant and regenerative properties.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Men**:
â­ Use the treatment at the first signs of weakening or thinning hair.
â­ Attack Phase: One vial every other day for 8 weeks.
â­ Maintenance Phase: 2 vials per week for 6 weeks.
â­ The treatment should be repeated at least twice a year (spring & autumn).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment Men**:
â­ TricosaccarideÂ®
â­ DN-Ageâ„¢

description_en:
Say goodbye to hair loss with **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment for Men**, the innovative solution to enhance the health of your hair and scalp.

Our advanced formula features Trisaccaride and Zanthin, essential ingredients that effectively reduce hair loss and promote natural hair growth. **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment for Men** works to strengthen the hair shaft, giving it vitality and freshness, which contributes to increasing its resistance. Additionally, this comprehensive treatment contains a unique blend of amino acids and essential vitamins for hair and scalp health, including Vitamins A, B5, C, E, and PP.

â­ Helps stop hair loss within 30 days.
â­ Promotes hair regrowth within 6 weeks.
â­ Delays hair aging, giving it a youthful and vibrant appearance.
â­ Increases the number of hairs in the growth phase (Anagen).
â­ Decreases the number of hairs in the fall phase (Telogen).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment for Men**:
â­ Use at the first signs of hair weakening or loss.
â­ Intensive treatment phase: 3 ampoules per week for two months.
â­ Maintenance phase: 2 ampoules per week for 6 weeks.
â­ The duration of the treatment can be evaluated based on the achieved results.
â­ It is recommended to repeat the treatment at least twice a year (in spring and fall).
â­ Each box provides one month of treatment.
â­ Can be applied to wet hair after shampooing or to dry hair.
â­ Leave in â€“ do not rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment for Men**:
â­ Trisaccaride
â­ Zanthin
â­ Amino Acid Mixture
â­ Vitamin A
â­ Vitamin B5
â­ Vitamin C
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Vitamin PP

description_en:
Discover ultimate care with **Foltene Shampoo Dermoprotective Hair**, meticulously formulated for a gentle cleansing action that preserves the natural balanced state of your hair and scalp. This lightweight shampoo is suitable for everyday use, making it an essential addition to your hair care routine.

**Product Benefits:**
â­ Free From SLES (Sodium Lauryl Sulphates).
â­ Free From Mineral Oil.
â­ Free From Silicones.
â­ Free From Paraffin wax.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Shampoo Dermoprotective Hair**:
â­ Apply the shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Massage gently for 3 minutes to ensure even distribution.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For more information, please read the package leaflet.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Shampoo Dermoprotective Hair**:
â­ Avena Extract: A natural rich emollient containing Vitamins A, B1, B2, D, and E, offering a soothing and protective effect.
â­ Aloe Extract: Rich in polysaccharides, plant sterols, mineral salts, and vitamins, it provides nourishing and protective properties, ideal for dry and sensitive scalps.
â­ Chamomile Extract: A natural extract known for its soothing and calming effects on irritated and itchy scalps.
â­ Panthenol (provitamin B5): With its emollient and lenitive properties, it effectively protects hair from dryness.

**Warnings and Cautions:** Store between 15Â°C and 25Â°C. Avoid direct sunlight. Shelf Life: 60 months, Period After Opening: 12 months.

description_en:
**Foltene Shampoo** is your daily solution for combating hair aging and greying, designed to protect and revitalize your locks. Enriched with potent antioxidants, DNAGE and Olive Extract, it shields your hair from environmental stress, restoring its shine, elasticity, volume, and softness. The powerful anti-aging properties of DN-Age effectively protect your hair from UV radiation, enhancing its density and resilience. Natural Olive Extract offers additional UV protection, preventing hair wear and tear for healthier, stronger hair. This advanced formula is free from sulfates, petroleum derivatives, silicones, and paraffin, ensuring a gentle yet effective cleansing experience.

**Product Benefits:**
â­ Prevents hair aging.
â­ Prevents hair thinning and greying.
â­ Protects against the harmful effects of hair dryers and styling tools.
â­ Suitable for daily use as a natural, detoxifying shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Shampoo**:
â­ Apply to damp hair and rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use daily or 3 times per week as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Shampoo**:
â­ DNAGE (potent antioxidant).
â­ Natural Olive Extract.
â­ Gentle formula free from sulfates, parabens, paraffin wax, silicones, and mineral oils.

description_en:
Product Description

Rediscover your hair's strength and vitality with **Foltene Complete Hair Treatment Value Pack**, the ultimate solution for women experiencing hair loss and thinning. This innovative formula is designed to halt hair fall and stimulate new hair growth effectively in just a few weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Foltene Complete Hair Treatment Value Pack**:

â­ Attack Phase: Use 3 vials per week for two months.
â­ Maintenance Phase: Use 2 vials per week for one month.
â­ It is recommended to repeat this treatment at least twice a year for sustained results.
â­ To ensure maximum benefits, remove the vial cap, press the button firmly to mix the active ingredient, and shake well. Attach the applicator and apply the solution to the scalp with a gentle massage. Do not rinse, allowing the ingredients to work effectively.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Foltene Complete Hair Treatment Value Pack**:

â­ TricalgoxylÂ®, derived from marine algae, safe for pregnant and breastfeeding women.
â­ A nourishing biomineral complex rich in essential minerals vital for healthy and strong hair growth.

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy, strong hair with **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment (Ampoules+Shampoo) Pack Women**. This comprehensive treatment is specifically designed to combat hair loss and thinning in women, while protecting the scalp from harmful environmental aggressors. **Foltene Hair Loss Treatment (Ampoules+Shampoo) Pack Women** replenishes nutrients and hydrates the hair deeply to fortify locks from root to tip. Its formula gently lifts away toxins from the scalp and restores the natural physiological balance, providing an anti-aging effect and promoting overall hair health.

**About the Product:**
â­ Increases the quantity of hair in the growing phase (Anagen) and can stop hair loss in just 30 days.
â­ Decreases the quantity of hair in the falling phase (Telogen).
â­ Increases the length and resistance of the hair, giving it strength, volume, and shine.

**Product Benefits:**
â­ Stops hair loss in 30 days and promotes hair regrowth within 6 weeks, delaying hair aging.
â­ Formulated without SLES, mineral oils, parabens, silicones, and paraffin wax for optimal care.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Foltene Hair Loss Treatment (Ampoules+Shampoo) Pack Women:**
â­ **For Shampoo:** Apply to damp hair, gently massage, and rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary. The delicate formulation makes it suitable for frequent use.
â­ **For Ampoules (Attack Phase):** 3 vials per week for two months.
â­ **For Ampoules (Maintenance Phase):** 2 vials per week for 6 weeks.
â­ The treatment can be applied to both wet (after shampoo) or dry hair. Do not rinse.
â­ The treatment should be repeated at least twice a year (spring and fall).

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Foltene Hair Loss Treatment (Ampoules+Shampoo) Pack Women:**
â­ Tricalgoxyl: FoltÃ¨neâ€™s patented active ingredient designed to enhance hair growth.
â­ Panax Ginseng Extract: Works to strengthen fine, fragile, and weak strands, restoring the natural balance of the scalp and supplying energy to the hair for body and shine.

#Foltene #HairLoss #HairTreatment #HealthyHair #HairCare #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #WomensHairLoss

description_en:
Experience unparalleled smoothness with **Veet Wax Strips for Sensitive Skin**. Specially formulated for sensitive skin, these strips efficiently remove hair from the root, leaving your skin smooth for up to 28 days. The innovative Easy-Gel formula is easy to use, gripping even short hair as little as 1.5mm, while leaving your skin moisturized and radiant with a refreshing lotus scent. Enjoy professional results at home with ease and safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Wax Strips for Sensitive Skin**:
â­ Warm the strips between your hands.
â­ Separate the strip into two.
â­ Apply the strip to the skin in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Pull the strip back quickly in the opposite direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the included wipe to remove any wax residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Wax Strips for Sensitive Skin**:
â­ Enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E to soothe the skin.
â­ Easy-to-spread and gripping gel formula.
â­ 100% Natural Extracts.
â­ Grape Seed Oil and Mineral Oil for added moisture.

description_en:
Experience silky smooth skin with **Veet** Hair Removal Cream for Sensitive Skin. Specially formulated for sensitive skin, this gentle cream is enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, providing deep hydration and soothing benefits. Featuring the new Silk & Fresh technology and a refreshing floral scent, **Veet** effectively removes hair in just minutes, leaving your skin feeling smooth, radiant, and confident. Rediscover your skin's softness and your self-assurance with **Veet**, the perfect solution for unwanted hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet**
â­ Using the curved part of the provided spatula, spread the cream evenly to fully coat the hair.
â­ Test for skin sensitivity first: Leave the cream on your skin for 3 minutes, then gently remove a small test area of cream with the spatula.
â­ If hair comes away easily, use the wider or narrower end of the spatula depending on the body part to remove the rest.
â­ If your hair is more stubborn, you can leave the cream on for up to 6 minutes in total â€“ but donâ€™t leave it any longer.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water to remove the cream completely and then pat dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet**
â­ Soothing Aloe Vera extract.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Gentle moisturizing formula.
â­ Refreshing floral scent.

#Veet #HairRemoval #SensitiveSkin #SilkySmooth #Skincare #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Moisturizing #AloeVera #NaturalBeauty

description_en:
Achieve smooth, hair-free skin with **Veet Wax Strips for Face Hair Removal**. These strips are meticulously designed for the sensitive facial area, providing you with smoothness that lasts up to 28 days. Thanks to their unique formula with Argan oil, **Veet Wax Strips for Face Hair Removal** not only effectively remove very short hair (as little as 1.5mm) but also moisturize your skin, leaving it radiant and healthy. Enjoy an easy, quick, and mess-free hair removal experience in the comfort of your own home.

â­ Twice the effectiveness compared to traditional methods.
â­ Removes hair as short as 1.5mm.
â­ Provides smoothness that lasts up to 28 days.
â­ Moisturizes and leaves skin delicately fragranced.
â­ Easy to use with the Easy Grip technology.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Wax Strips for Face Hair Removal**:
â­ Warm the strip between your hands.
â­ Carefully separate the two strips.
â­ Apply the strip to the skin in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Pull the strip quickly against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the included finishing wipes to remove any wax residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Wax Strips for Face Hair Removal**:
â­ Natural wax with Argan oil.
â­ Perfect finish wipes for cleansing.

#Veet #WaxStrips #HairRemoval #SmoothSkin #SkinCare #SkinMoisturizing #LongLastingSmoothness #Cosmetics #Makeup #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve salon-smooth skin in the bikini area with **Veet Wax Strips For Bikini Area 20 pcs**. These wax strips are specially designed to effectively remove even the shortest hairs, as little as 1.5mm, giving you up to 28 days of smoothness. Their innovative formula gently removes hair from the root, leaving your skin moisturized, radiant, and lightly fragranced.

**Veet Wax Strips For Bikini Area 20 pcs** feature Easy-Gel technology for quick and easy hair removal, even for those new to wax strips. Enjoy salon-like results in the comfort of your home, with easy application and no mess. With regular use, you'll notice that regrowth is finer, softer, and less visible.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Wax Strips For Bikini Area 20 pcs**

â­ Gently rub the strips between your hands to warm them up.
â­ Carefully peel the strips apart.
â­ Apply a strip to the skin in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Smooth the strip in the direction of hair growth with your hand, to ensure it adheres well.
â­ Pull the strip back in one quick motion, against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the Perfect Finish wipes to remove any wax residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Wax Strips For Bikini Area 20 pcs**

â­ Beeswax.
â­ Almond Oil.
â­ Chamomile Extract.
â­ Mineral Oil.
â­ Fragrance.

#Veet #WaxStrips #HairRemoval #BikiniArea #SmoothSkin #Skincare #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Dammam #Mecca #Medina #Khobar

description_en:
**Veet Pure** Wax Strips for Underarm Hair Removal, specifically designed for sensitive skin, providing you with smoothness that lasts up to 28 days.

Enjoy soft, hair-free skin with ease and effectiveness. **Veet Pure** wax strips remove hair from the root, even very short hair (1.5mm), giving you long-lasting results.

**Product Features:**
â­ Lasting smoothness up to 28 days.
â­ Ideal for the underarm area.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ 16 wax strips + 3 perfect finish wipes.
â­ Hypoallergenic wax formula.
â­ Dermatologically recommended.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pure**:
â­ Gently warm the wax strip between your hands.
â­ Slowly separate the two strips.
â­ Apply the wax strip to your skin in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Hold your skin taut and pull the strip off quickly in the opposite direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the included wipes to remove any wax residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pure**:
â­ Hypoallergenic formula.
â­ Natural mineral oils.
â­ Soothing skin extracts.

#Veet #VeetPure #HairRemoval #SensitiveSkin #Underarms #WaxStrips #SmoothSkin #Skincare #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Veet Wax Strips For Sensitive Skin** for body & legs with Aloe Vera & Vitamin E, designed for hair as short as 2mm, so you never have to wait for your hair to get "long enough" to wax. Features the Easy-Gel formula that flows around and actively grips the shortest hairs, not the skin. Removes hairs from the root for up to 28 days of smoothness. Enjoy the confidence to achieve great 1st time results, even for those inexperienced with wax strips.

**Product Features:**
â­ 2X more effective than Halawa.
â­ **Veet** Ready to use wax strips are an easy way to get long-lasting smoothness, without the hot sticky mess.
â­ Gentle on your skin while leaving it moisturized and shiny.
â­ Easy-grip technology helps you get rid of even 1.5mm short hair.
â­ Superior smoothness for body and legs.
â­ Leaves skin gently exfoliated and refreshed with a subtle lotus scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet** Wax Strips For Sensitive Skin:
â­ Warm the strip between your hands.
â­ Slowly peel the strips apart.
â­ Apply the strip to the skin in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Press down gently to ensure good adhesion.
â­ Pull the strip back swiftly against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the Perfect Finish wipe for cleansing and moisturizing after hair removal.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet** Wax Strips For Sensitive Skin:
â­ Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum)
â­ Polyisobutene
â­ Ethylhexyl Stearate
â­ Polyster-1
â­ Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate
â­ Grape Seed Oil (Vitis Vinifera)
â­ Iron Oxides (CI 77491)
â­ Polyethylene
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)

#Veet #WaxStrips #HairRemoval #SensitiveSkin #Smoothness #Beauty #Skincare #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Achieve silky smooth skin with **Veet Pro Dom Bikini & Underarm Cream**. Expertly formulated for effective yet gentle hair removal in sensitive areas.

â­ Effectively removes unwanted hair from the bikini and underarm regions.
â­ Features a creamy, easy-to-apply formula that dissolves hair follicles.
â­ Delivers temporary results, with hair typically growing back within weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pro Dom Bikini & Underarm Cream**:
â­ Clean the area to be treated with warm water and soap.
â­ Apply a thick layer of the cream to the desired area, ensuring it covers the hair completely.
â­ Leave the cream on for the recommended time, usually 3-5 minutes.
â­ Use a spatula or cloth to remove the cream and hair.
â­ Rinse the area thoroughly with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pro Dom Bikini & Underarm Cream**:
â­ Active Ingredients: Work to break down the protein structure of hair.
â­ Moisturizers: Help to soothe the skin after hair removal.

title_ar: ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø¥Ø²Ø§Ù„Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙÙŠÙŠØª Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø³Ø© 200 Ø¬Ø±Ø§Ù…
description_en:
Experience silky smooth skin with **Veet Hair Removal Cream** for sensitive skin. Say goodbye to painful or expensive traditional methods and give your skin the ultimate solution for easy and effective hair removal at home. **Veet Hair Removal Cream** features a unique formula that gently removes even the shortest hairs, leaving your skin soft and moisturized for up to a week. With ingredients like Lotus Milk and Aloe Vera, it soothes and brightens your skin while providing a refreshing violet blossom fragrance.

**Product Features:**
â­ Painless hair removal in just a few minutes.
â­ Smoothness that lasts up to 7 days.
â­ Suitable for legs, arms, underarms, and bikini line.
â­ Leaves skin soft and moisturized.
â­ Pleasant violet blossom fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Hair Removal Cream**:
â­ Spread the cream evenly on dry, clean skin.
â­ Leave on for 3-6 minutes depending on hair thickness.
â­ Use the included spatula to remove the cream and hair.
â­ Rinse the skin thoroughly with water and pat dry gently.
â­ It is recommended to perform a patch test on a small area of skin before full use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Hair Removal Cream**:
â­ Lotus Milk.
â­ Soothing Aloe Vera.
â­ Violet Blossom Fragrance.
â­ Aqua, Urea, Cetearyl Alcohol, Potassium Thioglycolate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Ceteth-20, Calcium Hydroxide, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Glycerin, Parfum, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Benzoate, Magnesium Silicate, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Benzyl Alcohol, Methyl Benzoate, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid.

#Veet #HairRemoval #SensitiveSkin #Skincare #SoftSkin #SkinMoisturizer #HairRemovalCream #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #Beauty

title_ar: Ú¤ÙŠØª Ø´Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ø­ Ø´Ù…Ø¹ÙŠØ© Ù„Ø¥Ø²Ø§Ù„Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø§ÙØ© - 20 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Achieve silky smooth skin with Veet Wax Strips for Dry Skin.

**Veet** wax strips are designed to effectively remove even the shortest hair (as little as 1.5mm), providing you with up to 28 days of smoothness and instant skin exfoliation. Specially formulated for dry skin, they leave your skin moisturized and delicately fragranced, with Easy Grip technology for efficient hair removal in just one stroke. Enjoy radiant, healthy-looking skin with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet**:
â­ Rub a double wax strip between your hands to warm it.
â­ Carefully peel the strips apart.
â­ Apply one strip to your skin, rubbing in the direction of hair growth several times.
â­ Hold your skin taut and pull the strip back in one swift motion, against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the Perfect Finish wipes for a final clean.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet**:
â­ Wax strips ingredients: Triethylene Glycol Rosinate, Glyceryl Rosinate, Silica, Polyethylene, Parfum, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate.
â­ Luminous fish wipes ingredients: Paraffinum Liquidum, Hexyldecyl Stearate, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Parfum, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.

#VeetBeauty #Skincare #HairRemoval #WaxStrips #Veet #SmoothSkin #SkinMoisture #BodyCare #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience long-lasting smoothness with **Veet Wax Strips**, the perfect solution for removing hair from the root and achieving radiant skin. These strips are specifically designed for normal skin, moisturizing your skin deeply with shea butter and a refreshing wild berry scent, giving you confidence and freshness for up to 28 days. **Veet Wax Strips** feature Easy-Grip technology that effectively removes even the shortest hairs, eliminating the need for salon visits and giving you the freedom to wear what you want, anytime.

â­ Removes hair from the root for smoothness that lasts up to 28 days.
â­ Easy-Grip technology ensures effective removal of very short hair (from 1.5mm).
â­ Moisturizes the skin thanks to shea butter and leaves it fragranced with a wild berry scent.
â­ Extremely easy to use, no heating required, providing a mess-free experience.
â­ Makes future hair growth finer and less dense.
â­ Comes with Perfect Finish wipes for easy cleanup post-use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Wax Strips**:
â­ Gently separate the wax strips.
â­ Apply the strip to the skin in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Pull the strip back quickly in the opposite direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the Perfect Finish wipes to cleanse any wax residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Wax Strips**:
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum.
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii Butter.
â­ Vaccinium Macrocarpon Fruit Extract.
â­ Other moisturizing ingredients.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled smoothness with **Veet Pure**, the perfect solution for facial hair removal for your sensitive skin. These strips are meticulously designed to give you silky-smooth skin that lasts up to 28 days, reducing the need for frequent touch-ups. **Veet Pure** is your ideal choice for delicate areas like the upper lip, cheeks, and chin, leaving your skin radiant and free from unwanted hair. Enjoy a gentle, dermatologist-recommended formula to minimize the risk of allergic reactions and ensure a safe and comfortable experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pure**:
â­ Gently warm the wax strip between your hands.
â­ Carefully separate the two strips.
â­ Apply the strip in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Pull the strip quickly against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the included perfect finish wipes to cleanse the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pure**:
â­ Natural waxes.
â­ Mineral oil.
â­ Coconut oil.
â­ Soothing botanical extracts.
â­ Light fragrance.

#Veet #VeetPure #HairRemoval #FacialHair #SensitiveSkin #LongLastingSmoothness #SkinCare #SaudiArabia #Beauty #PersonalCare

shortdescription_en: Achieve superior smoothness for your sensitive facial skin with Veet Pure. Gently removes hair and lasts up to 28 days. For soft, radiant skin.

title_en: Veet Hair Removal Cream In Shower Silk & Lotus - 150 gm
title_ar: Ú¤ÙŠØª ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø²ÙŠÙ„ Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø£Ø«Ù†Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ­Ù…Ø§Ù… Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø±ÙŠØ± ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù„ÙˆØªØ³ - 150 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Discover ultimate skin smoothness with **Veet Hair Removal Cream In Shower Silk & Lotus**. 

Effortlessly remove unwanted hair in the shower with **Veet Hair Removal Cream In Shower Silk & Lotus**. Its water-resistant formula is designed to work effectively even when in contact with water, providing a comfortable and quick hair removal experience. The included exfoliating sponge leaves your skin silky smooth and radiant.

Simplify your daily routine and enjoy smooth, glowing skin ready for your day with the perfect solution from Veet.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Hair Removal Cream In Shower Silk & Lotus**:
â­ Before starting, ensure your skin is clean and dry.
â­ Apply the cream evenly to the area where you want to remove hair.
â­ Leave it on for 3 minutes while showering.
â­ Use the white side of the sponge to remove the cream and hair in gentle circular motions.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water.
â­ Use the colored side of the sponge to massage your skin, leaving it soft.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Hair Removal Cream In Shower Silk & Lotus**:
â­ Aqua, Urea, Potassium Thioglycolate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cetearyl Alcohol, Calcium Hydroxide, Talc, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Potassium Hydroxide, Magnesium Trisilicate, Parfum, Propylene Glycol, Lithium Magnesium Sodium Silicate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Sodium Gluconate, Acrylates Copolymer, Linalool, Hydrated Silica, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Hexyl Cinnamal, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, CI 77891.

description_en:
Experience ultimate smoothness with **Veet Hair Removal Cream with Lotus Milk for Normal Skin 100 Gm**. Our innovative formula efficiently removes hair, leaving your skin silky soft and refreshed with the essence of Lotus Milk. **Veet Hair Removal Cream with Lotus Milk for Normal Skin 100 Gm** works close to the root of the hair, ensuring long-lasting smoothness. Enjoy hair-free, deeply moisturized skin in just minutes.

â­ Effectively removes hair, even the shortest ones.
â­ Leaves skin silky smooth for longer.
â­ Enriched with Lotus Milk for a refreshing and gentle fragrance.
â­ Works close to the root for slower hair regrowth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Hair Removal Cream with Lotus Milk for Normal Skin 100 Gm**

â­ Using the curved side of the applicator, spread the cream evenly to coat the hair completely.
â­ Leave the cream on your skin for 5 minutes.
â­ Use the applicator to gently remove a small test area of cream. If hair comes away easily, use the wider or narrower end of the applicator to remove the rest. If hair is more stubborn, you can leave the cream on for up to 6 minutes in total.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water to remove the cream completely and then dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Hair Removal Cream with Lotus Milk for Normal Skin 100 Gm**

â­ Aqua
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Calcium Thioglycolate
â­ Calcium Hydroxide
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Ceteareth-20
â­ Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract
â­ Ricinus Communis Seed Oil
â­ Parfum

description_en:
Achieve silky, smooth, and confident skin with **Veet Hair Removal Cream for Dry Skin**.

Nourish your dry skin with **Veet Hair Removal Cream for Dry Skin**, enriched with Lily extract, leaving it clean, hair-free, and velvety soft for up to weeks. It takes just 3 minutes to banish fuzz and make your skin clean and clear. This cream weakens hair at the root, ensuring efficient removal and making unwanted hair take longer to grow back, with no stubbly feel. Our specially formulated cream makes your skin radiant and glowing. It dissolves hair below your skin's surface, removing even the shortest hairs.

Experience a truly amazing hair removal and get soft, moisturized, and scented skin with just one swipe.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Hair Removal Cream for Dry Skin**:
â­ Using the curved part of the spatula, spread the cream evenly to fully coat the hair.
â­ Test for skin sensitivity first: leave the cream on your skin for 3 minutes, then gently remove with the spatula.
â­ If the hair comes away easily, use the wider or narrower end of the spatula to remove the rest.
â­ If your hair is more stubborn, you can leave the cream on for up to 6 minutes in total â€“ but donâ€™t leave it any longer.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water to remove the cream completely and then dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Hair Removal Cream for Dry Skin**:
â­ Enriched with Lily extract.
â­ Gentle formula for dry skin.
â­ Silk & Fresh Technology.
â­ Delicate fragrance.

description_en:
Achieve silky smooth skin with **Veet In-Shower Hair Removal Cream**. This innovative formula is specially designed for effective hair removal while keeping your skin moisturized, even during quick showers. Discover the new Silk & Fresh Technology that leaves your skin with a refreshing and soft scent.

â­ Effectively removes hair in just minutes.
â­ Water-resistant formula designed to dissolve slowly upon contact with water.
â­ Silk & Fresh Technology to ensure no unpleasant odor.
â­ Moisturizes skin and leaves it feeling silky smooth for up to 24 hours.
â­ Infused with aloe vera for a refreshing scent.

description_en:
Achieve silky smooth skin with **Veet Wax Strips For Normal Skin**. These strips are expertly designed for effective hair removal, leaving your skin moisturized and radiant. Enriched with shea butter and a refreshing berry scent, they provide smoothness that lasts up to 28 days. Discover the ease of use that delivers professional salon results right in your home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Wax Strips For Normal Skin**:
â­ Gently peel the strips apart.
â­ Apply to skin in the opposite direction of hair growth.
â­ Pull the strip back in a quick motion for smooth skin.
â­ Use the included wipes for a perfect finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Wax Strips For Normal Skin**:
â­ Shea butter for deep moisturization.
â­ Berry scent for a refreshing experience.
â­ Easy-Gel technology to grip even the shortest hairs.
â­ Gentle wax strips for skin comfort.

description_en:
Experience ultimate smoothness with **Veet Pure In-Shower Hair Removal Cream** (150g), the perfect solution for busy, on-the-go women.

Its water-resistant formula is designed to dissolve slowly on contact with water, allowing you to step into the shower while it works its magic to reveal smooth, soft skin in minutes.

â­ Dissolves slowly on contact with water.
â­ Ideal for busy lifestyles.
â­ Exceeds expectations with skin-smoothing magic.
â­ Leaves skin feeling gleaming and soft.
â­ Simplify your shower routine and feel ready to start your day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pure In-Shower Hair Removal Cream**
â­ Suitable for use on legs, arms, underarms, and bikini line.
â­ Apply the cream to clean, wet skin.
â­ Leave for 3 minutes while you do your shower routine.
â­ Remove the cream with the provided exfoliating sponge.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Do not exceed 6 minutes total application time.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse immediately if contact occurs.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pure In-Shower Hair Removal Cream**
â­ Lotus Milk and Jasmine Fragrance.

description_en:
Discover a superior smooth experience with **Veet Pure**, an innovative formula specifically designed for sensitive skin. **Veet Pure** gives you silky smooth skin that lasts, with a pure scent free from the unpleasant ammonia odor. Enjoy an effective and gentle hair removal experience, while maintaining your skin's hydration for up to 24 hours. Perfect for removing hair from legs and body, giving you a professional finish in the comfort of your home.

â­ Say goodbye to unpleasant ammonia smell with our new formula.
â­ Long-lasting smoothness even on short hair.
â­ Specially formulated for sensitive skin.
â­ Leaves your skin silky smooth and hydrated for up to 24 hours.
â­ Removes hair from the root for softer, less stubbly regrowth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pure**:
â­ Using the rounded side of the spatula, spread the cream evenly to cover the hair completely.
â­ Leave the cream on your skin for 5 minutes.
â­ Use the spatula to gently remove the cream. If hair is not removed easily, you can leave it on for up to 10 minutes maximum.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water to completely remove the cream and pat dry gently.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pure**:
â­ Aqua, Urea, Cetearyl Alcohol, Calcium Hydroxide, Potassium Thioglycolate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Ceteareth-20, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Parfum, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Achieve smooth, hair-free skin with **Veet Pro Legs & Body Cream**. Experience an effective and gentle hair removal that leaves your skin perfectly soft.

â­ Advanced creamy formula that gently dissolves hair follicles.
â­ Temporary results for smoothness that lasts for weeks.
â­ Suitable for use on legs and body for perfect skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pro Legs & Body Cream**:
â­ Clean the area thoroughly with warm water and soap.
â­ Apply a thick layer of cream to completely cover the hair.
â­ Leave the cream on for 3-5 minutes as per instructions.
â­ Use the included spatula to gently remove the cream and hair.
â­ Rinse the area thoroughly with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pro Legs & Body Cream**:
â­ Active Ingredients: Thioglycolic acid or calcium thioglycolate to break down hair protein structure.
â­ Natural moisturizers to soothe and hydrate the skin after use.

#VeetPro #HairRemovalCream #HairRemoval #Skincare #SoftSkin #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Mecca #Madinah

description_en:
Say goodbye to unwanted hair with **Veet** Pure for Sensitive Skin. These wax strips offer an effective and easy-to-use solution for silky smooth skin that lasts up to 28 days. **Veet** Pure is specially formulated for sensitive skin, minimizing the risk of irritation and allergic reactions, so you can enjoy healthy, beautiful skin.

â­ Dermatologically recommended.
â­ Hypoallergenic wax formula.
â­ Provides smoothness that lasts up to 28 days.
â­ Ideal for legs and body.
â­ Gentle on sensitive skin.
â­ Comes with 20 wax strips and 4 finishing wipes.
â­ Sufficient for multiple hair removal sessions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet** Pure for Sensitive Skin:
â­ Ensure your skin is completely dry.
â­ Always pull the wax strip back against the direction of hair growth, keeping the strip close to the skin.
â­ The faster you pull the strip, the more effective the hair removal.
â­ You can reuse each strip multiple times until it loses its grip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet** Pure for Sensitive Skin:
â­ Sweet Almond Oil.
â­ Shea Butter.
â­ Gentle moisturizing ingredients.
â­ High-quality natural wax.

description_en:
Experience ultimate smoothness with **Veet Pure Cws Legs+Underarm 50% Off 36 pcs**. Achieve silky-soft skin that lasts up to 28 days with our innovative formula, specially designed for sensitive skin.

â­ Removes hair from the root, as short as 1.5mm.
â­ Hypoallergenic wax formula, dermatologically tested and recommended.
â­ Pack includes wax strips and perfect finish wipes for guaranteed results.
â­ Provides smoothness that lasts for up to 28 days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pure Cws Legs+Underarm 50% Off 36 pcs**:
â­ Ensure your skin is clean and completely dry before use.
â­ Warm the strip between your hands for a few seconds.
â­ Separate the two strips.
â­ Apply the strip to the skin in the direction of hair growth and rub well.
â­ Hold the skin taut with one hand and pull the strip back quickly against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the wipes for a perfect finish after removal.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pure Cws Legs+Underarm 50% Off 36 pcs**:
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum.
â­ Isopropyl Myristate.
â­ Polybutene.
â­ Hydrogenated Styrene/Butadiene Copolymer.
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil.
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate.
â­ The perfect finish wipes contain Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil and Oenothera Biennis Oil.

title_ar: ÙÙŠØª Ø´Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ø· Ø§Ù„Ø´Ù…Ø¹ Ù„Ù„Ø³Ø§Ù‚ÙŠÙ† ÙˆØ§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ - Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø³Ø© (50%)
description_en:
Achieve long-lasting, silky-smooth skin with **Veet CWS Legs & Face Wax Strips**, specially formulated for sensitive skin. These strips effectively remove hair from the root, even short hairs, leaving your skin smooth for up to 28 days. Their innovative, dermatologist-recommended formula minimizes the risk of irritation, providing you with a comfortable and efficient hair removal experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet CWS Legs & Face Wax Strips**:
â­ Ensure your skin is completely dry before use. A light dusting of talc can help ensure dryness.
â­ Gently separate the wax strips.
â­ Apply the strip to the area to be waxed, smoothing it in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Hold your skin taut and pull the strip back swiftly in the opposite direction of hair growth.
â­ Each strip can be reused until it loses its stickiness.
â­ Use the included wipes to gently clean off any wax residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet CWS Legs & Face Wax Strips**:
â­ High-quality wax for effective hair removal.
â­ Soothing ingredients for sensitive skin.
â­ Almond oil known for its moisturizing properties.
â­ Shea butter for added hydration and skin nourishment.
â­ Vitamin E for protection and anti-aging benefits.

#Veet #HairRemoval #WaxStrips #SmoothSkin #Skincare #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #Khobar #Beauty

description_en:
Experience superior smoothness with **Veet Pure** Hair Removal Cream for Legs & Bikini. Achieve silky-soft, hair-free skin in just minutes. Our innovative formula is free from ammonia, making your hair removal experience comfortable and refreshing. Perfect for sensitive skin, it delivers long-lasting results, leaving your skin moisturized and soft.

â­ Unbeatable smoothness that lasts.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Free from ammonia for a refreshing scent.
â­ Removes even the shortest hairs from the root.
â­ Provides extra skin moisturization.
â­ Easy to use at home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pure**:
â­ Before use, please read the precautions on the packaging carefully.
â­ Using the curved part of the spatula, spread the cream evenly to fully cover the hair.
â­ Leave the cream on your skin for 5 minutes, then gently remove the cream with the spatula from a small test area.
â­ If the hair is removed easily, use the broad or narrow end of the spatula, depending on the body area, to remove the rest of the cream from the skin. If your hair is more stubborn, you can leave the cream on for up to 10 minutes in total.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water to remove the cream completely, then pat dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pure**:
â­ Hair removal cream with fewer ingredients.
â­ Innovative formula with a refreshing scent.
â­ Effectively removes hair in 5-10 minutes.

description_en:
Experience long-lasting smoothness for up to 28 days with **Veet** Wax Strips for Legs & Bikini. These easy-to-use strips are designed with the innovative EASY-GELWAX technology that effectively grips even the shortest hairs (as little as 1.5mm), providing you with superior smoothness and removing hair from the root. The **Veet** Pure hypoallergenic formula minimizes the risk of skin irritation, and it contains 50% fewer chemical ingredients compared to our essential ranges. Suitable for legs, arms, underarms, and bikini line.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet** Wax Strips for Legs & Bikini:
â­ Warm the strip between your hands.
â­ Gently peel the strips apart.
â­ Apply the strip in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Firmly hold your skin taut with one hand, and pull the strip off in one swift motion against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the included wet wipes to clean off any wax residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet** Wax Strips for Legs & Bikini:
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Hydrogenated Styrene/Methylstyrene/Indene Copolymer
â­ Silica Dimethyl Silylate
â­ Polybutene
â­ Cera Microcristallina

description_en:
Experience silky smooth skin in your bikini area with **Veet Pure Cold Wax Bikini Strips for Sensitive Skin**. These specially designed strips cater to sensitive skin, offering a gentle yet effective hair removal experience. Enjoy smoothness that lasts up to 28 days, removing hair from the root, even as short as 1.5mm.

â­ Up to 28 days of smoothness.
â­ Removes hair from the root.
â­ Effective on short hair (1.5mm).
â­ Easy to use for perfect results.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pure Cold Wax Bikini Strips for Sensitive Skin**:
â­ Warm the strip between your hands.
â­ Slowly separate the strips.
â­ Apply the strip to the skin in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Press down firmly to ensure good adhesion.
â­ Pull the strip off quickly against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the included wipes to remove any residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pure Cold Wax Bikini Strips for Sensitive Skin**:
â­ Paraffin Wax
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Chamomile Extract
â­ Other natural ingredients for reduced sensitivity.

description_en:
Experience ultimate smoothness with **Veet Pure Bikini Hair Removal Cream**. Specially formulated for sensitive skin, this cream offers an effective and gentle hair removal experience without the need for salon visits. Say goodbye to unwanted hair and enjoy silky-smooth skin that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pure Bikini Hair Removal Cream**:
â­ Remove the cap from the tube.
â­ Apply the cream directly from the tube onto unwanted hair using the curved part of the applicator. Spread a thick, even layer of cream.
â­ Do not rub the cream into your skin.
â­ Leave the cream on your skin for 5 minutes, then gently remove the cream with the spatula from a small test area.
â­ If hair removes easily, use the broad or narrow end of the spatula to remove the rest of the cream.
â­ For more stubborn hair, leave the cream on for up to 10 minutes in total.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water and pat dry.
â­ Wipe the top of the tube and replace the cap.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pure Bikini Hair Removal Cream**:
â­ Dermatologically tested.
â­ No more ammonia smell.
â­ Long-lasting smoothness.
â­ Gentle on sensitive skin.
â­ Takes 5 - 10 minutes.

description_en:
Say goodbye to unwanted hair and hello to lasting smoothness with **Veet Pure**. These wax strips are specially designed to provide an effective yet gentle hair removal experience, leaving your skin silky smooth for up to 28 days. Perfect for legs, face, and sensitive skin, **Veet Pure** delivers professional results at home. Enjoy hair-free skin with ease and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pure**
â­ For best results, ensure your skin is clean and completely dry before using the strips.
â­ Warm the strip between your hands for a few seconds.
â­ Carefully separate the two strips.
â­ Apply the strip to your skin in the direction of hair growth and rub gently to ensure it adheres well.
â­ Hold the skin taut and pull the strip off quickly against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the included wipes to gently clean off any wax residue.
â­ The strip can be reused until it loses its stickiness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pure**
â­ Hypoallergenic wax formula.
â­ Gentle ingredients for skin compatibility.
â­ Designed to remove hair from the root.
â­ Fragrance-free for sensitive skin.

description_en:
Say goodbye to unwanted hair with **Veet Wax Strips Face Normal Skin 20 Strips**. These strips are specially designed for the sensitive facial area, providing you with smoothness that lasts up to 28 days, effectively removing even the shortest hairs as little as 1.5mm. Enjoy soft, moisturized, and gently fragranced facial skin.

**Veet Wax Strips Face Normal Skin 20 Strips** offer an easy and quick experience, requiring no heating and leaving your skin radiant and glowing. Perfect for use at home or on the go, they ensure hair-free skin with twice the effectiveness of traditional methods.

â­ **Features of Veet Wax Strips Face Normal Skin 20 Strips**:
â­ Specially formulated for sensitive facial skin.
â­ Provides long-lasting smoothness for up to 28 days.
â­ Effectively removes very short hair with Easy-Grip technology.
â­ Leaves skin moisturized and delicately fragranced.
â­ Easy to use in simple steps: Peel, Apply, Pull.
â­ Delivers results twice as effective as traditional tools.

ğŸ”¹ **Usage Instructions for Veet Wax Strips Face Normal Skin 20 Strips**:
â­ Gently peel the wax strips apart to prepare them for use.
â­ Apply the strip to the area from which you want to remove hair.
â­ Pull the strip back quickly and firmly in the opposite direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the included finishing wipes to remove any wax residue and achieve a perfect finish.

ğŸ”¹ **Ingredients of Veet Wax Strips Face Normal Skin 20 Strips**:
â­ A blend of natural oils and moisturizers to soothe the skin.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Effective ingredients for root hair removal.

#Veet #WaxStrips #HairRemoval #Skincare #SmoothSkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Face #LongLastingSmoothness #WomensCare

description_en:
**Veet Wax Strips Bikini&Underarm Normal Skin 16 Strips**

Achieve salon-like smooth skin with **Veet Wax Strips Bikini&Underarm Normal Skin 16 Strips**. These easy-to-use wax strips are specially designed for effective hair removal from sensitive areas like the bikini line and underarms. Enjoy up to 28 days of smoothness, moisturized, and radiant skin. Our advanced formula with Easy-GelFlow grips even the shortest hairs (from 1.5mm) from the root, providing exceptional results even for beginners. Experience a pleasant gel texture, a delightful fragrance, and beautifully soft skin with every use. Regular use leads to finer and softer regrowth.

â­ Provides long-lasting smoothness for up to 28 days.
â­ Effectively removes hair as short as 1.5mm.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft, moisturized, and fragrant.
â­ Mess-free and ready to use for ultimate convenience.
â­ Perfect for delicate areas like bikini and underarms.
â­ Gentle formula with 100% natural extracts.
â­ Promotes softer and finer hair regrowth with regular use.
â­ Comes with Perfect Finish wipes for a perfect clean finish.
â­ Twice as effective as traditional hair removal methods.
â­ Delivers an amazing hair removal experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Wax Strips Bikini&Underarm Normal Skin 16 Strips**

â­ Peel the strips apart to expose the wax.
â­ Apply to the skin in the opposite direction of hair growth.
â­ Pull the strip back quickly and in one swift motion against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the Perfect Finish wipe to remove any wax residue and to ensure a perfectly smooth finish.
â­ No heating required, ready for immediate use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Wax Strips Bikini&Underarm Normal Skin 16 Strips**

â­ Hair removal wax with a gentle gel formula.
â­ Enriched formula for skin hydration post-removal.
â­ Refreshing and pleasant fragrance.
â­ Natural extracts to enhance skin softness.

#Veet #WaxStrips #HairRemoval #Skincare #SmoothSkin #SaudiBeauty #BikiniWax #UnderarmHair #BeautyTips #PersonalCare

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness with **Veet Miraculous Oil**, the perfect oil for your skin care routine before and after hair removal.

âœ… Moisturised skin for up to 24 hours.
âœ… A unique blend of 100% natural origin oils, including Avocado Oil, Shea Butter, and Sweet Almond Oil, for deep nourishment.
âœ… Ideal for face and body, providing instant hydration.
âœ… Helps prevent razor burn and irritation, making your shaving experience more comfortable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Miraculous Oil**
â­ Before & After Shaving: Apply to skin to enhance razor glide and reduce irritation.
â­ In Between Hair Removal Sessions: Moisturizes and nourishes the skin to maintain its softness.
â­ Anytime Moisturizing: Use as a daily moisturizer for soft, hydrated skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Miraculous Oil**
â­ Avocado Oil
â­ 100% Natural Origin Oils
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Sweet Almond Oil
â­ Sunflower Oil
â­ Apricot Kernel Oil

description_en:
Achieve silky smooth skin with **Veet Natural Cws Bikini with Argan Oil 16 pcs**. These specially formulated wax strips are designed for sensitive skin, providing effective hair removal even for the shortest hairs (1.5mm) while gently moisturizing.

Enjoy smoothness that lasts up to 28 days and instant skin exfoliation, all from the comfort of your home. **Veet Natural Cws Bikini with Argan Oil 16 pcs** features an easy-to-use gel formula that grips hair, not skin, reducing discomfort and delivering professional results.

Product Features:
â­ Long-lasting smoothness up to 28 days.
â­ Easy-Grip technology for removing very short hair.
â­ Perfect for sensitive areas like bikini and underarms.
â­ Gentle formula for sensitive skin.
â­ Refreshing scent leaves skin soft and fragranced.
â­ Easy to use, mess-free application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Natural Cws Bikini with Argan Oil 16 pcs**:
â­ Peel the strips apart.
â­ Apply to the skin in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Pull the strip back quickly in the opposite direction of hair growth.
â­ Use the Perfect Finish wipes for cleansing and moisturizing the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Natural Cws Bikini with Argan Oil 16 pcs**:
â­ 100% Natural Extracts.
â­ Gentle gel formula for the skin.
â­ Moisturizing and refreshing ingredients.

#Veet #HairRemoval #WaxStrips #SmoothSkin #Skincare #HairRemover #Riyadh #Jeddah #SaudiArabia #Beauty

description_en:
Experience ultimate smoothness with **Veet Pure Bikini & Underarm Hair Removal Cream Kit**. Specially formulated for sensitive areas, it provides you with soft, hair-free skin with minimal ingredients and a pure, ammonia-free fragrance. Enjoy hydrated, radiant skin that lasts.

â­ Effectively and gently removes hair.
â­ Provides long-lasting smoothness.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Free from unpleasant ammonia smell.
â­ Hydrates skin for up to 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Veet Pure Bikini & Underarm Hair Removal Cream Kit**:
â­ Apply the cream evenly to the area from which you want to remove hair.
â­ Leave on for 5-10 minutes.
â­ Gently remove with the provided spatula or a soft cloth.
â­ Rinse the area thoroughly with cool water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Veet Pure Bikini & Underarm Hair Removal Cream Kit**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Calcium Thioglycolate
â­ Calcium Hydroxide
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Ceteareth-20
â­ Glycerin
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil
â­ Parfum

description_en:
Experience refreshing relief with **Vicks VapoDrops** Orange Menthol Lozenges.

**Vicks VapoDrops** lozenges are designed to soothe sore throat symptoms, relieve coughs, and unblock nasal passages. Whether your sore throat comes with an irritating cough or a blocked nose, these lozenges provide immediate comfort and a refreshing sensation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vicks VapoDrops**:
â­ Adults and Children 6 years and above: Dissolve 1 lozenge in your mouth every 2 hours as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vicks VapoDrops**:
â­ Each Lozenge contains extracts equivalent to dry:
  â­ Glycyrrhiza glabra (Liquorice root) 15mg
  â­ Zingiber officinale (Ginger) 10mg
  â­ Phyllanthus emblica (Indian gooseberry) 10mg
  â­ Menthol 7mg

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Contains sugars.
â­ Not to be consumed by children under 2 years of age. For children between 2-6 years, speak to your doctor for medical advice.
â­ Do not use if blister seal is broken.
â­ Store below 30 C.
â­ If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.

title_en: Vicks Sweet Dreams Humidifier Vul575E1: Soothing Comfort & Peaceful Sleep for Your Child
title_ar: ÙÙŠÙƒØ³ Ø³ÙˆÙŠØª Ø¯Ø±ÙŠÙ…Ø² Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² Ù„ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ùˆ Vul575E1: Ø±Ø§Ø­Ø© ÙˆÙ†ÙˆÙ… Ù‡Ø§Ø¯Ø¦ Ù„Ø·ÙÙ„Ùƒ
description_en:
Create a perfect sleep environment for your child with the **Vicks Sweet Dreams Humidifier Vul575E1**. This humidifier creates a comforting and soothing atmosphere that helps your child enjoy deep, peaceful sleep, while providing temporary relief from cold symptoms like coughs and congestion. The **Vicks Sweet Dreams Humidifier Vul575E1** is designed to offer a unique experience by projecting enchanting dream-inspired visuals across three different themes: Sea, Safari, or Starry Night, with 3 scenes per theme. The humidifier operates with ultra-quiet technology to ensure your child's precious sleep is undisturbed. It also features dual scent pad slots to enhance the effect of soothing Vicks vapors, is easy to clean thanks to its wide tank opening, and automatically shuts off when the water runs out.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vicks Sweet Dreams Humidifier Vul575E1**
â­ Fill the tank with clean water.
â­ Add a few drops of essential oils or Vicks VapoPads for enhanced soothing fragrance (optional).
â­ Choose from the various visual projections to suit your child's mood.
â­ Adjust the humidity level as needed.
â­ Ensure regular cleaning of the tank to maintain optimal performance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vicks Sweet Dreams Humidifier Vul575E1**
â­ Cool mist humidifier technology.
â­ Visual projection system with three different dream themes.
â­ Dual scent pad slots (Vicks VapoPads sold separately).
â­ Auto shut-off system when water level is low.
â­ Easy-to-clean design.

#Vicks #Humidifier #KidsSleep #SoothingComfort #SaudiArabia #CoolMist #CoughRelief #HealthyEnvironment #PeacefulSleep #BabyEssentials

description_en:
Experience soothing relief with **Vicks VapoDrops** Berry Flavor Lozenges, your go-to solution for tackling cough and sore throat symptoms. These expertly crafted lozenges are designed to provide fast-acting and effective relief, helping you feel better and get back to your routine.

**Vicks VapoDrops** are formulated to help relieve cough, unblock your nose, and soothe your irritated throat, making them your essential companion during illness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vicks VapoDrops**:
â­ Adults and Children 6 years and above: Dissolve 1 lozenge in your mouth every 2 hours as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vicks VapoDrops**:
â­ Glycyrrhiza glabra (Liquorice root) 15mg
â­ Zingiber officinale (Ginger) 10mg
â­ Phyllanthus emblica (Indian gooseberry) 10mg
â­ Menthol 7mg

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Contains sugars.
â­ Not to be consumed by children under 2 years of age. Speak to your doctor for medical advice for children between ages 2-6 years.
â­ Do not use if blister seal is broken.
â­ Store below 30Â°C.
â­ If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.

description_en:
Product Description:

Soothe your throat and relieve bothersome symptoms with **Vicks VapoDrops**. These effective lozenges are designed to provide quick relief from cough, sore throat, and nasal congestion. Enjoy the refreshing orange flavor that makes your recovery more pleasant. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vicks VapoDrops**:
â­ Adults and Children 6 years and above: Dissolve 1 lozenge in your mouth every 2 hours as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vicks VapoDrops**:
â­ Glycyrrhiza glabra (Liquorice root) 15mg
â­ Zingiber officinale (Ginger) 10mg
â­ Phyllanthus emblica (Indian gooseberry) 10mg
â­ Menthol 7mg

Cautions & Warnings:
â­ Not to be consumed by children under 2 years of age.
â­ Speak to your doctor for medical advice for children between ages 2- 6 years.
â­ Do not use if blister seal is broken.
â­ Store below 30 C.
â­ If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.

description_en:
Experience immediate relief with **Vicks VapoRub** 100 gm, the ultimate solution for relieving cold symptoms, coughs, and congestion. **Vicks VapoRub** is designed to provide you with easier breathing and a soothing, comforting sensation.

**Vicks VapoRub** helps to unblock your nose, calm coughs associated with colds, and relieve minor muscle aches and pains. Enjoy peace and tranquility during your recovery.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vicks VapoRub**:
â­ Adults: Rub liberally onto chest, throat, and back. Cover the whole area for maximum effect. Leave nightclothes loose to allow vapours to be inhaled easily.
â­ Children over 2 years: Apply lightly to the chest and back. Leave clothes loose for easy inhalation.
â­ Inhalation Method: For deep action relief, melt two teaspoons of **Vicks VapoRub** in a bowl of very hot (not boiling) water. Inhale the soothing medicated vapours for 10-15 minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vicks VapoRub**:
â­ Active Ingredients: Menthol 2.8%, Camphor 5.3%, Eucalyptus Oil 1.3%.
â­ Other Ingredients: Turpentine Oil, Bay Leaf Oil, Nutmeg Oil, Thymol.

description_en:
Discover early cold protection with **Vicks First Defense** Nasal Spray. Specifically designed to act at the first signs of a cold or when you feel an increased risk of infection. Whether you're experiencing a tickle in your throat or sneezing, or even when someone around you is sick, **Vicks First Defense** is your first line of defense. It helps to limit the development of cold symptoms in their early stages.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vicks First Defense**:
This spray is intended for individuals aged 12 years and over and is recommended for use at the very first symptoms of a cold.
â­ Spray 2-3 sprays into each nostril up to 4 times a day.
â­ Wait at least 4 hours between doses.
â­ Do not exceed 4 sprays per day.
â­ Recommended for use for up to 4 days if symptoms do not develop, or until symptoms subside if they persist.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vicks First Defense**:
â­ Water
â­ Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose (1%)
â­ Succinic Acid (1%)
â­ Disodium (0.44%)
â­ PCA (0.35%)
â­ Phenethyl Alcohol
â­ Zinc EDTA
â­ Zinc Acetate
â­ Polysorbate 80
â­ Menthol
â­ Camphor
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Eucalyptol

title_ar: ÙÙŠÙƒØ³ ÙØ§Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø§Ø¨ 50 Ø¬Ù… - Ù„ØªØ®ÙÙŠÙ Ø§Ù„Ø³Ø¹Ø§Ù„ ÙˆØ§Ø­ØªÙ‚Ø§Ù† Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø±Ø¯
description_en:
Find effective relief with **Vicks VapoRub** 50 gm, your trusted companion for soothing coughs and clearing nasal congestion. **Vicks VapoRub** works to calm your throat and relieve stuffy nose, allowing for easier breathing. It also gently eases minor muscle aches associated with colds. Experience its dual action: inhale the soothing medicated vapors to decongest your nasal passages, or apply it to your skin to alleviate discomfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vicks VapoRub**:
â­ Adults: Rub liberally onto chest, throat, and back. Cover the whole area for maximum effect. Leave night clothes loose to allow vapors to be inhaled easily.
â­ Children over 2 years: Apply lightly to chest and back. Leave clothes loose for easy inhalation.
â­ Inhalation Method: For deep action relief, melt two teaspoons of **Vicks VapoRub** in a bowl of very hot (not boiling) water. Inhale the soothing medicated vapors for 10â€“15 minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vicks VapoRub**:
â­ Active Ingredients: Menthol (2.8%), Camphor (5.3%), Eucalyptus Oil (1.3%).
â­ Other Ingredients: Turpentine Oil, Lavender Oil, Nutmeg Oil, Thymol.

#Vicks #VapoRub #ColdRelief #CoughSuppresant #Decongestant #NasalCongestion #RespiratoryHealth #Wellbeing #SaudiArabia #HealthCare

Breathe easy with the **Vicks Inhaler**, your go-to solution for instant nasal congestion relief. Its powerful menthol-infused formula opens up your airways, providing immediate comfort and a refreshing sensation.

â­ Provides instant refreshing relief.
â­ Helps to unblock nasal passages.
â­ Features a potent formula with natural oils.
â­ Compact design for easy portability and use anytime, anywhere.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vicks Inhaler**
To use the **Vicks Inhaler**, insert it into each nostril and take a deep inhalation until your nasal passages feel clear and breathing is improved.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vicks Inhaler**
â­ Menthol
â­ Camphor
â­ Methyl salicylate

description_en:
Soothe your little one's sniffles and coughs with **Vicks Babyrub** 50 gm. Specially formulated for babies and young children, this gentle ointment provides comforting relief from common cold symptoms. When your baby is struggling with a stuffy nose or bothersome cough, **Vicks Babyrub** offers a calming sensation to help restore peace and promote restful sleep.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Vicks Babyrub**:
â­ Gently apply a small amount to your baby's chest or forehead.
â­ Use sparingly on the skin.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes, mouth, and broken skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Vicks Babyrub**:
â­ A blend of natural herbs for effective soothing.
â­ Gentle formula, free from harsh ingredients, ensuring safety for delicate baby skin.

description_en:
Pamper your sensitive skin with **Fem Body Wax Strips**. Enriched with strawberry extracts, known for their antioxidants, Vitamin C, and salicylic acid, these strips help combat skin damage and aging. Combined with nourishing beeswax, they ensure your sensitive skin becomes not only smooth and hair-free but also pampered and protected.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fem Body Wax Strips**:
â­ Wash and dry the skin thoroughly.
â­ Warm the wax strip between your hands for a few seconds.
â­ Slowly separate the two strips.
â­ Apply the strip to the hair in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Hold your skin taut with one hand, and pull the strip off quickly in one swift motion against the direction of hair growth.
â­ To remove any remaining wax, simply use the moistened wipe or wash with water.
â­ The strips can be reused several times until they lose their stickiness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fem Body Wax Strips**:
â­ Strawberry Extracts.
â­ Beeswax.
â­ Other natural ingredients.

#Fem #WaxStrips #SensitiveSkin #SmoothSkin #HairRemoval #SkinCare #BeautyProducts #SkinHydration #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Say goodbye to unwanted hair and hello to silky smooth skin with **Fem Hair Removing Cream Rejuvenating Chamomile**. This innovative cream is meticulously crafted to provide your skin with the gentle care it deserves, effectively and painlessly removing hair.

The **Fem Hair Removing Cream Rejuvenating Chamomile** features a unique formula that combines efficient hair removal with skin-nourishing and moisturizing benefits. Enriched with Avocado Oil and 100% natural Sandalwood extracts, it soothes the skin, leaving it exceptionally soft and delicately fragranced for long-lasting freshness. Achieve radiant, beautiful skin with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fem Hair Removing Cream Rejuvenating Chamomile**:
â­ Apply the cream evenly to the area from which you wish to remove hair. Do not rub the cream into the skin.
â­ Leave the cream on the skin for 3 minutes. For stubborn hair, leave it on for a maximum of 10 minutes.
â­ DO NOT EXCEED 10 MINUTES.
â­ Use the included spatula to remove the cream and unwanted hair immediately.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with plenty of water, then pat dry gently.
â­ Gently massage the included pH Balancing Soothing Moisture Lotion onto the treated skin for instant soothing and moisturization.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fem Hair Removing Cream Rejuvenating Chamomile**:
â­ Avocado Oil
â­ 100% Natural Sandalwood Extract
â­ Chamomile
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Active Hair Removal Ingredients

#FemHairRemoval #Fem #Skincare #SmoothSkin #HairRemoval #SoftSkin #Beauty #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia #HealthAndBeauty

â­ Apply the cream evenly onto the area from which you wish to remove hair. Do not rub in.
â­ Leave on the skin for 3 minutes; for stubborn hair, leave for a maximum of 10 minutes.
â­ Use the provided spatula to remove the cream and hair. Watch unwanted hair come off immediately.
â­ Rinse the skin thoroughly with water and pat dry gently.
â­ Gently massage the pH Balancing Soothing Moisture Lotion onto the treated area for instant coolness, soothed, and moisturized skin.

description_en:
Love your skin with **Fem Facial Wax Strip Sensitive Skin 20pcs**. Your favorite Fem Wax Strips are enriched with strawberry extracts, rich in antioxidants, Vitamin C, and salicylic acid to help combat skin damage and the effects of aging. They also contain plenty of beeswax, ensuring your sensitive skin not only becomes smooth and hair-free but is also pampered and protected.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fem Facial Wax Strip Sensitive Skin 20pcs**:
â­ Wash and dry the skin thoroughly.
â­ Warm the wax strip between your hands for a few seconds.
â­ Slowly, pull the strips apart.
â­ Apply the strip over the hair in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Holding your skin taut with one hand, immediately remove the strip in a fast, single action against the direction of hair growth.
â­ If thereâ€™s any wax still on the skin, use a wet wipe or wash it off easily with water.
â­ Strips can be reused several times until they lose their stickiness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fem Facial Wax Strip Sensitive Skin 20pcs**:
â­ Strawberry Extracts
â­ Beeswax
â­ Natural Ingredients for Sensitive Skin Care

description_en:
Experience ultimate smoothness with **Fem Deep Moisturising Hair Removal Cream with Aloe**, meticulously crafted to give your skin the gentle pampering it deserves. This cream effectively removes stubborn hair painlessly, enriched with the goodness of Avocado Oil and 100% natural Sandalwood extracts. **Fem Deep Moisturising Hair Removal Cream with Aloe** soothes your skin, keeping it nourished and soft, revealing a naturally beautiful you.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fem Deep Moisturising Hair Removal Cream with Aloe**:
â­ Apply the cream evenly onto the desired area.
â­ Leave on for 3 minutes; for stubborn hair, leave for a maximum of 10 minutes.
â­ Do not exceed the recommended time.
â­ Remove the cream with the included spatula, then rinse the skin thoroughly with water and pat dry.
â­ Gently massage the included pH balancing lotion onto the treated area for instant cooling, soothing, and moisturization.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fem Deep Moisturising Hair Removal Cream with Aloe**:
â­ Avocado Oil
â­ 100% Natural Sandalwood Extracts
â­ Contains Thioglycolate.
â­ Contains Alkali.

description_en:
Discover freshness and health with **Femfresh Wash 250ml**, specially designed for the delicate skin of intimate areas, which differs significantly from the rest of your body. Regular body soaps and shower gels often have high pH levels that can harm sensitive skin. That's why **Femfresh Wash** is the perfect solution for keeping your intimate areas fresh, healthy, and irritation-free. Its unique low pH formula, enriched with Aloe Vera and Calendula, gently cleanses and soothes. Dermatologically and gynecologically tested, hypoallergenic, and soap-free, it is suitable for all sensitive skin types. Regular use will leave you feeling fresh all day long without any itchiness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Femfresh Wash**:
â­ Lather a small amount of **Femfresh Wash** onto the intimate area.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Use regularly for irritation-free, fresh, and healthy skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Femfresh Wash**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Calendula Officinalis flower extract
â­ Aloe Barbadensis extract
â­ Glycerin
â­ Lactic Acid
â­ pH-balanced
â­ Soap-free
â­ Hypoallergenic
