title_ar: ÙÙŠÙ… ÙØ±ÙŠØ´ Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® Ù…Ø²ÙŠÙ„ Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ø±Ù‚ Ù„Ù„Ù…Ù†Ø·Ù‚Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù…ÙŠÙ…ÙŠØ© - 125 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience all-day freshness and confidence with **Femfresh Intimate Deodorant Spray**.

This gentle and refreshing spray provides effective protection against unwanted odors, especially during humid and sunny days, safeguarding you from any embarrassment.

Stand out with purity and a long-lasting fragrance with **Femfresh Intimate Deodorant Spray**, combining the power of natural ingredients and herbs for superior care of sensitive areas.

**Product Features:**
â­ Locks down odor with the 'MultiActif' calendula complex and moisturizing silk extract, providing a gentle protective layer.
â­ Talc-free and hypoallergenic, perfect for daily use.
â­ Offers a delicate, long-lasting scent to boost confidence and freshness.
â­ Contains Zinc Oxide for its skin-protective properties in intimate areas.
â­ Dermatologically and gynecologically tested, approved for female intimate areas.
â­ Refreshing scent with long-lasting effects to cover long working hours.
â­ Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.
â­ Provides a moisturizing effect and prevents irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Femfresh Intimate Deodorant Spray**
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can a few inches away from the body, directing the spray nozzle towards the desired area.
â­ Spray the deodorant onto intimate areas.
â­ Can be used directly on the skin or on undergarments.
â­ Use daily for a refreshing, long-lasting feeling of comfort and cleanliness.
â­ Recommended usage is once or twice daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Femfresh Intimate Deodorant Spray**
â­ Butane, Propane, Corn Starch, Parfum, Zinc Oxide, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Disiloxane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, and Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract.

#Femfresh #IntimateCare #FeminineHygiene #DeodorantSpray #Freshness #Confidence #PersonalCare #Beauty #WomensHealth #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover superior freshness and cleanliness with **Femfresh Active Fresh Wash 250 ml**. Its effective, soap-free formula gently cleanses your intimate skin, leaving it silky smooth. Gynecologically tested and pH-balanced for ultimate safety, **Femfresh Active Fresh Wash 250 ml** is enriched with moisturizing frangipani, lactic acid, and white lily, providing long-lasting freshness and a scent that stays with you all day. It offers unparalleled comfort and an instant feeling of freshness thanks to its multi-active neutralizing complex and silver ions, keeping you fresh for longer. It's the perfect choice for daily care of your sensitive skin, hydrating the intimate area for super comfort and freshness that lasts up to 24 hours.

**Product Features:**
â­ Hypoallergenic and soap-free formula for lasting comfort.
â­ Enriched with silver ions, antioxidants, and ginseng extract for optimal hydration and dry, fresh skin.
â­ Multi-active complex provides a fresh and comfortable feeling for up to 24 hours.
â­ A perfect blend of ingredients to boost confidence and promote happiness and freshness.
â­ Suitable for daily use and gynecologically approved for safety and effectiveness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Femfresh Active Fresh Wash 250 ml**:
â­ Use daily to gently cleanse intimate skin.
â­ Lather up and rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Can also be used as a normal shower gel.
â­ Suitable for everyday use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Femfresh Active Fresh Wash 250 ml**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Triethyl Citrate, Parfum, Laureth-4, Polyquaternium-39, Sodium Hydroxide, Dichlorobenzyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Lactic Acid, Sodium Carbonate, Butylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid (and) Silver Citrate, 2-Bromo-2-Nitropropane-1, 3-Diol, Sodium Benzoate, Calendula Officinalis Extract, Lilium Candidum Flower Extract, Plumeria Alba Extract, Methylparaben Propylparaben, Sodium Lactate.

#Femfresh #IntimateCare #FeminineWash #PersonalHygiene #DailyFreshness #Skincare #SaudiBeauty #WomensHealth #CareProducts #SkinHydration

title_ar: ÙÙŠÙ… ÙØ±ÙŠØ´ Ø³Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙŠ Ø§ÙƒØªÙ Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù‚ØµÙˆÙ‰ Ù„Ù„Ù…Ù†Ø§Ø·Ù‚ Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù…ÙŠÙ…Ø© 125 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience the refreshing scent of **Femfresh Active Fresh Deodorant Ultimate Care 125 ml** as part of your beauty routine and say goodbye to body odor. This deodorant is designed with a unique formula featuring silver ions and a Multi Actif odor freshening complex, providing up to 12 hours of freshness. **Femfresh Active Fresh Deodorant Ultimate Care 125 ml** is made without alcohol and aluminum, making it incredibly safe for daily use, even on intimate areas. It's formulated to give you the confidence to embrace an active lifestyle with a mild fragrance, ensuring you step out feeling fresh and empowered. Enjoy long-lasting protection and a feeling of cleanliness and refreshment.

Product Features:
â­ Provides effective protection against odor for up to 12 hours.
â­ Gentle, alcohol-free, and aluminum-free formula.
â­ Leaves you feeling fresh all day long.
â­ Does not stain and can be used directly on underwear or clothing.
â­ Dermatologically and gynaecologically tested.
â­ Hypoallergenic formula suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Femfresh Active Fresh Deodorant Ultimate Care 125 ml**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can a few inches away from your body, pointing the spray nozzle towards the area you wish to spray.
â­ Spray onto your body or underwear.
â­ Repeat as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Femfresh Active Fresh Deodorant Ultimate Care 125 ml**:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Propylene Carbonate, Disiloxane, Zea Mays Starch, Cyclopentasiloxane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Citric Acid, Silver Citrate, Parfum, Chlorhexidine Dihydrochloride, Serica Powder, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Aqua, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract.

title_en: Femfresh Active Fresh Wash Ultimate Care 250 ml
title_ar: ÙÙŠÙ… ÙØ±ÙŠØ´ ØºØ³ÙˆÙ„ Ø£ÙƒØªÙ ÙØ±ÙŠØ´ Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù‚ØµÙˆÙ‰ 250 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover ultimate freshness with **Femfresh Active Fresh Wash Ultimate Care** 250 ml, specially formulated for complete intimate care. Its soap-free formula gently purifies sensitive skin, leaving it feeling incredibly soft and silky smooth.

Gynecologically tested and pH-balanced for safe daily use, **Femfresh Active Fresh Wash Ultimate Care** is enriched with moisturizing frangipani, lactic acid, and white lily. This powerful blend delivers long-lasting freshness and a pleasant scent throughout your day.

**Femfresh Active Fresh Wash Ultimate Care** provides comprehensive comfort for your intimate area, working in perfect harmony to give you an instant feeling of freshness. Infused with a multi-active neutralizing complex and silver ions, this wash helps keep you feeling fresh for longer. The silver-ion technology, combined with antioxidants and ginseng extract, moisturizes your intimate area, ensuring superior comfort and a consistently fresh feeling.

â­ Hypoallergenic & soap-free for 24-hour freshness and cooling comfort.
â­ Ultimate intimate skin care powered by silver-ion technology, antioxidants, and ginseng.
â­ Provides up to 24 hours of freshness and comfort with a multi-active neutralizing complex.
â­ A unique blend of antioxidants and ginseng for daily confidence and revitalized freshness.
â­ Dermatologically tested and suitable for everyday use, gynecologically approved for maximum safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Femfresh Active Fresh Wash Ultimate Care**
â­ Use daily to gently cleanse intimate skin.
â­ Lather up and rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Can also be used as a normal shower gel.
â­ Dermatologically tested and appropriate for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Femfresh Active Fresh Wash Ultimate Care**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Glycol Distearate, Triethyl Citrate, Parfum, Laureth-4.
â­ Polyquaternium-39, Sodium Hydroxide, Dichlorobenzyl Alcohol, Glycerin.
â­ Lactic Acid, Sodium Carbonate, Butylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol.
â­ Citric Acid (and) Silver Citrate, 2-Bromo-2-Nitropropane-1, 3-Diol, Sodium Benzoate.
â­ Calendula Officinalis Extract, Lilium Candidum Flower Extract, Plumeria Alba Extract.
â­ Methylparaben Propylparaben, Sodium Lactate.

shortdescription_en: Femfresh Active Fresh Wash Ultimate Care: Superior 24-hour freshness & comfort. Soap-free, with silver ions & ginseng.

title_en: Femfresh Sensitive Powder 200 gm
title_ar: ÙÙŠÙ… ÙØ±ÙŠØ´ Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø± Ù„Ù„Ù…Ù†Ø·Ù‚Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø³Ø© 200 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Experience freshness and comfort with **Femfresh Powder**, a specially formulated powder designed to absorb excess moisture and provide long-lasting freshness. Its gentle, talc-free formula is dermatologically and gynecologically tested, ensuring maximum safety for your delicate skin. **Femfresh Powder** offers extra protection with zinc oxide, known for its skin-soothing and protective properties. Enjoy its mild fragrance that boosts your confidence throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Femfresh Powder**:
â­ After showering, thoroughly dry your skin.
â­ Apply a suitable amount onto your hand and gently pat onto intimate areas and underarms.
â­ Can be used to set makeup or control T-zone shine.
â­ For makeup setting, apply generously with a sponge or brush, leave for 5-10 minutes, then dust off excess with a powder brush.
â­ To remove, use a mild cleanser or intimate wash with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Femfresh Powder**:
â­ Zea Mays.
â­ Tricalcium Phosphate.
â­ Parfum.
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone.
â­ Amyl Cinnamal.
â­ Benzyl Alcohol.
â­ Benzyl Benzoate.
â­ Benzyl Salicylate.
â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional.
â­ Citronellol.
â­ Eugenol.
â­ Geraniol.
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal.
â­ Hydroxycitronellal.
â­ Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde.
â­ Isoeugenol.
â­ Limonene.
â­ Linalool.

#Femfresh #IntimateCare #FeminineHygiene #BodyPowder #Skincare #BeautyProducts #Freshness #Talcfree #SaudiBeauty #DailyCare

description_en:
Experience instant freshness and soothing comfort with **Femfresh** Freshening & Soothing Intimate Wipes. Specially formulated for intimate skin, these wipes provide a feeling of cleanliness and confidence throughout your day. Their gentle, dermatologically tested formula ensures the utmost care without irritation. Perfect for on-the-go use, after workouts, or anytime you need a quick refresh.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Femfresh**:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Gently pull out one wipe and cleanse the intimate area as needed.
â­ Reseal the pack tightly after each use to maintain moisture.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Femfresh**:
â­ Water, Glycerin, Chamomile Extract, Aloe Vera Extract, Light Fragrance, Gentle Preservatives.
â­ Alcohol-free and soap-free formula.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

description_en:
Achieve your deepest tan yet with **Carrot Sun**, the original and innovative tanning cream. 

This cream accelerates your skin's natural tanning process with L-TYROSINE, while fruits and nuts provide deep moisture. Antioxidants protect against free radicals from UV rays, leaving you with a beautiful golden color. Vitamins, carotenoids, and essential fatty acids nourish your skin for a healthy, radiant look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carrot Sun**:
â­ Apply generously to your skin for the best tanning results.
â­ Use **Carrot Sun** on holiday or in sunbeds.
â­ This product does not contain SPF; instead, it contains lycopene, which acts as a natural protector. It can be applied over any SPF cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carrot Sun**:
â­ Contains Almond and Wheat Oil.
â­ L-TYROSINE to accelerate tanning.
â­ Antioxidants for skin protection.

#tanning #suntan #sunscreen #skincare #moisturizer #summer #beach #ksa #riyadh #jeddah

description_en:
Achieve the perfect tan with **Carrot-Sun Carrot Oil Sun Tan Oil 200 ml**. This unique formula combines L-TYROSINE to accelerate tanning and extracts from fruits and nuts for deep hydration. Antioxidants protect your skin from UV-induced free radical damage, while providing beautiful golden results. Vitamins, carotenoids, and essential fatty acids nourish your skin for a healthy and attractive tanning experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carrot-Sun Carrot Oil Sun Tan Oil 200 ml**:
â­ Apply generously to the skin for the best tanning results.
â­ Take your **Carrot Sun** on vacation or use it in a solarium.
â­ The product contains lycopene, which acts as a natural sun protector, and does not contain SPF directly. It can be easily applied over a sunscreen cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carrot-Sun Carrot Oil Sun Tan Oil 200 ml**:
â­ Almond Oil.
â­ Wheat Germ Oil.
â­ L-TYROSINE.
â­ Antioxidants.
â­ Vitamins, Carotenoid, and Essential Fatty Acids.

description_en:
Discover beachside magic with **Carrot Sun Cream Avec Pasteque-With Watermelon 350 ml**, specially formulated to give your skin a radiant, bronzed golden glow while providing deep hydration and protection. Enjoy a natural and perfect tanning experience with this refreshing extract-rich product.

â­ Delivers a natural and attractive bronzed skin tone.
â­ Deeply moisturizes the skin and maintains its softness.
â­ Enriched with refreshing and nourishing watermelon extract.
â­ Suitable for use on all skin types.
â­ The delicious watermelon scent makes the tanning experience enjoyable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carrot Sun Cream Avec Pasteque-With Watermelon 350 ml**:
â­ Apply generously to clean, dry skin before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply as needed, especially after swimming or sweating.
â­ Avoid direct sun exposure during peak hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carrot Sun Cream Avec Pasteque-With Watermelon 350 ml**:
â­ Natural Watermelon Extract.
â­ Moisturizing Oils (e.g., Coconut Oil, Almond Oil).
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Other skin-caring ingredients.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Carrot Sun Gold Tan Accelerating Cream**, a luxurious, perfumed blend designed to develop a base tan for all skin types. It deeply moisturizes and contains the natural tan accelerator L-Tyrosine, almond oil rich in vitamin E, and wheat germ oil packed with essential fatty acids. This premium formula nourishes the skin for optimal tanning conditions, leaving your complexion hydrated and positively glowing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carrot Sun Gold Tan Accelerating Cream**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to the desired area before sun exposure.
â­ Can be applied on top of any SPF cream for enhanced tanning results.

Warnings & Precautions:
â­ Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear.
â­ If irritation or rash persists, consult a physician.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Do not swallow.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact, rinse eyes thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carrot Sun Gold Tan Accelerating Cream**:
â­ Active Ingredients: Octinoxate 4.5%, Octisalate 1.5%
â­ Natural Botanical extracts and anti-oxidant Vitamins
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Avocado Oil, Beta-Carotene, Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Fragrance, Jojoba Oil, Mineral Oil, Octinoxate, Octisalate, Pomegranate Oil, Soy Bean Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate.

#Tanning #SunKissed #SkinCare #Moisturizer #NaturalOils #Vitamins #Summer #Beach #HealthyGlow #Beauty

description_en:
Achieve the perfect golden tan with **Carrot Sun Oil Pasteque - Watermelon Infused Tanning Oil 200ml**. This nourishing oil combines the benefits of carrot oil with the refreshing hydration of watermelon extract. Enjoy protected, moisturized skin while enhancing your natural glow under the sun. Its lightweight formula absorbs quickly, leaving your skin smooth, radiant, and subtly scented with a refreshing watermelon aroma.

â­ Hydrating formula enriched with watermelon extract to refresh and moisturize the skin.
â­ Carrot oil benefits: Rich in beta-carotene to enhance your natural tan and nourish the skin.
â­ Provides effective sun protection against harmful UV rays.
â­ Lightweight texture that absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue.
â­ Refreshing watermelon scent perfect for summer days.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carrot Sun Oil Pasteque - Watermelon Infused Tanning Oil 200ml**
â­ Apply generously to clean, dry skin before sun exposure.
â­ Massage the oil gently into your skin until fully absorbed.
â­ Reapply every two hours, especially after swimming or sweating.
â­ Use after sun exposure to maintain hydration and prolong your tan.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carrot Sun Oil Pasteque - Watermelon Infused Tanning Oil 200ml**
â­ Carrot Oil: Rich in antioxidants and vitamins for deep nourishment.
â­ Watermelon Extract: Hydrates and refreshes, providing a cooling effect.
â­ SPF Ingredients: Help protect against UVA and UVB rays.

#TanningOil #CarrotSun #SunKissed #Skincare #Moisturizing #SPF #BeautyProducts #SummerEssentials #HealthySkin #NaturalOil

description_en:
Achieve a perfect tan with **Carrot-Sun Papaya Tan Accelerator Cream**. This amazing cream is designed to accelerate tanning for all skin types, especially fair skin that tans with difficulty. Enriched with papaya oil, rich in antioxidants, **Carrot-Sun Papaya Tan Accelerator Cream** combats free radicals caused by UV rays, protecting your skin. It contains natural L-Tyrosine to boost a long-lasting, deep golden tan, along with henna for a rich, saturated color. Enjoy the refreshing fruity scent while getting a gorgeous bronzed glow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carrot-Sun Papaya Tan Accelerator Cream**
â­ Use during sunbathing or on sunbeds.
â­ Does not contain SPF, but can be applied over any sunscreen.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carrot-Sun Papaya Tan Accelerator Cream**
â­ Papaya Oil: Rich in antioxidants.
â­ L-Tyrosine: Natural tanning accelerator.
â­ Henna: To enhance deep golden color.

description_en:
Achieve your dream bronze glow with **Carrot Sun Tan Cream with Coconut Oil**. This is the first and original tanning accelerator cream developed by Carrot SunÂ®, designed to speed up your natural tanning process and give you a deep, rich bronze colour as quickly as possible. It's best suited for olive skin or fair skin that already has a base tan.

The **Carrot Sun Tan Cream with Coconut Oil** features a unique formula containing natural tan accelerators like L-Tyrosine and carrot oil. These ingredients work synergistically with sunlight to stimulate melanin production, ensuring you get a faster, more intense tan. The addition of henna enhances your colour to a stunning, deep golden hue and prolongs the life of your tan.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carrot Sun Tan Cream with Coconut Oil**
â­ Use during sunbed sessions or while on holiday.
â­ Can be applied on top of any SPF cream for desired protection while enhancing your tan.
â­ Please note: This product does not contain SPF Sun Protection Factor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carrot Sun Tan Cream with Coconut Oil**
â­ L-Tyrosine: To stimulate the natural tanning process.
â­ Carrot Oil: To enhance bronze colour and nourish the skin.
â­ Henna: For a rich, dark colour that lasts.
â­ Coconut Oil: To moisturise the skin during tanning.

#Tanning #SunTan #Skincare #CarrotSun #TanOil #BeachLife #SummerVibes #BronzeSkin #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve a radiant golden glow with **Carrot Sun Oil Gold for Beach**. This unique oil is enriched with L-TYROSINE to accelerate your tanning process, while FRUIT and NUTS provide penetrating moisture. ANTIOXIDANTS protect your skin from UV-induced free radicals, delivering beautiful GOLD COLOR results. VITAMINS, CAROTINOID, and ESSENTIAL FATTY ACIDS nourish your skin, leaving it soft and hydrated.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carrot Sun Oil Gold for Beach**:
â­ Apply a generous amount of the product to your skin for the best tanning results.
â­ Take your **Carrot Sun Oil Gold for Beach** on vacation or use it in a solarium.
â­ The product does not contain SPF (Sun Protection Factor) but instead contains lycopene, which acts as a natural SPF.
â­ It can be easily applied over a sunscreen cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Carrot Sun Oil Gold for Beach**:
â­ Almond Oil.
â­ Wheat Germ Oil.
â­ L-TYROSINE.
â­ Fruit and Nuts.
â­ Antioxidants.
â­ Vitamins.
â­ Carotenoid.
â­ Essential Fatty Acids.

Indulge in the rich taste of **Canderel** Simply Dark Chocolate 100g, featuring 0% added sugar. Experience the pure pleasure of dark chocolate without the guilt, as **Canderel** offers a delicious sweet treat that's perfect for enjoying anytime. It's an ideal choice for those seeking a delightful, no-added-sugar option to share with friends and family.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Canderel** Simply Dark Chocolate:
â­ Enjoy a piece of **Canderel** chocolate as a delightful snack at any time of the day.
â­ Perfect for sharing with family and friends as a satisfying treat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Canderel** Simply Dark Chocolate:
â­ Cocoa Mass
â­ Sweetener (Erythritol, Steviol Glycosides)

â­ Cocoa Butter
â­ Emulsifier: Soya Lecithin
â­ Nature-identical Vanilla Flavour

description_en:
Enjoy perfect sweetness without worries with **Canderel** tablets.

Say goodbye to sugar and worries about blood sugar levels with the small and effective **Canderel** sweetener tablets. These tablets are carefully designed to suit your healthy lifestyle, providing natural sweetness to add to your favorite drinks and foods. Whether you're enjoying tea, coffee, fruits, or breakfast cereals, **Canderel** tablets are the ideal solution.

**Product Features:**

â­ Tooth-friendly, maintaining oral health and helping prevent tooth decay.
â­ Authentic Swiss taste that adds a great flavor to your meals and drinks.
â­ A healthy choice with low calories, fat, and carbohydrates, perfect for diabetics.
â­ Suitable for vegans and gluten-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Canderel**:

â­ One tablet is sufficient to sweeten a small cup of tea or coffee, with a sweetening power equivalent to one tablespoon of sugar.
â­ Ideal for daily use in various beverages and foods.
â­ Please check the expiry date printed on the packaging.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Canderel**:

â­ Sweeteners: Acesulfame-K, Aspartame (8.5mg).
â­ Net Content: 300 tablets.
â­ Calories: 0.2 kcal per tablet.
â­ Carbohydrates: 0g per tablet.
â­ Fat: 0g per tablet.

description_en:
Discover the delightful taste of **Canderel** Chocolate Fruity & Nutty 100gm, a delicious blend of rich milk chocolate with crunchy raisins and tasty almonds, featuring absolutely no added sugar. It's the perfect choice for those seeking a sweet indulgence without the guilt, ideal for sharing with loved ones on any special occasion or as an everyday treat. This **Canderel** chocolate offers an irresistible flavor experience without compromising your calorie intake.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Canderel** Chocolate Fruity & Nutty:
â­ Enjoy as a snack any time of the day.
â­ Share with family and friends as a special gift.
â­ Perfect as a healthier alternative to traditional sweets.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Canderel** Chocolate Fruity & Nutty:
â­ Sweetener (Maltitol 304000mg \kg)
â­ Milk Powder (Cow's Milk)
â­ Cocoa Butter
â­ Raisins (14%)
â­ Cocoa Mass
â­ Almonds (6%)
â­ Dietary Fiber (Inulin)
â­ Concentrated Butter (Cow's Milk)
â­ Emulsifier (Soya Lecithin)
â­ Nature-Identical Vanilla Flavour.

**Caution & Warnings:** Contains: Cow's Milk, Almonds, Soya. Excessive consumption may have a laxative effect. May contain traces of peanuts and other nuts. Store in a cool, dry place.

description_en:
**Canderel** Chocolate Fingers 21.5gm are a delicious and healthy treat, combining light and crunchy wafers with rich milk chocolate. Enjoy a fantastic taste with no added sugar, making it a suitable option for those monitoring their sugar intake.

**Product Benefits:**
â­ Rich and delicious milk chocolate taste.
â­ 0% added sugar, perfect for sugar control.
â­ Crispy wafer fingers for a delightful experience.
â­ Made from the finest quality ingredients for superior taste.
â­ Ideal as an everyday treat or an on-the-go snack.
â­ A great choice for those seeking healthier alternatives.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Canderel**:
â­ Enjoy one or two pieces as a satisfying snack.
â­ Perfect accompaniment to your coffee or tea.
â­ Can be served as a healthier dessert option.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Canderel**:
â­ Milk chocolate 81% (sweeteners: maltitol).
â­ Cocoa butter, whole milk powder (cow's milk).
â­ Cocoa mass, emulsifier (soya lecithin).
â­ Natural vanilla flavouring.
â­ Sweeteners (maltitol).
â­ Vegetable fats (palm fruit).
â­ Rice flour, potato starch, teff grain flour, soya flour.
â­ Fat-reduced cocoa powder.
â­ Emulsifier (soya lecithin).
â­ Vegetable oil (coconut).
â­ Egg yolk.
â­ Salt.
â­ Raising agent: sodium carbonates.

**Contains:**
â­ Cow's milk, soya, egg.
â­ May contain traces of tree nuts.

**Caution:**
â­ Excessive consumption may have a laxative effect.

title_ar: ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø¯Ø±ÙŠÙ„ Ø³ÙƒØ± Ø³ØªÙŠÙÙŠØ§ 100 Ù…ØºÙ„Ù - ØªØ­Ù„ÙŠØ© Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ© Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ø³Ø¹Ø±Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø±Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Enjoy natural sweetness without the guilt with **Canderel Stevia Sachets**.

**Canderel Stevia Sachets** are crafted from pure stevia leaf extracts, offering you the sweet taste you love without the extra calories. These individually wrapped sachets are perfect for everyday use at home or on-the-go. They feature a unique blend of stevia and sucralose, with a sweetness equivalent to 2.5 teaspoons of regular sugar.

**Canderel Stevia Sachets** are the ideal sweeteners for a variety of beverages such as tea, coffee, lemonade, and even protein shakes, making them a healthy and delicious choice.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Canderel Stevia Sachets**

â­ Use one sachet of **Canderel Stevia Sachets** in your daily cup of tea, coffee, lemon, or protein shake for instant sweetness without the guilt or added calories.
â­ Each **Canderel Stevia Sachets** sachet contains only 0.4 calories, equivalent to the sweetness of one teaspoon of sugar (16 calories).
â­ **Canderel Stevia Sachets** are suitable for diabetics.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Canderel Stevia Sachets**

â­ Sweeteners: Maltitol (E965) 975.6 mg/g, Acesulfame Potassium (E950) 11 mg/g (Maximum daily intake: 9 mg per kg body weight), Sucralose (E955) 6.4 mg/g (Maximum daily intake: 5 mg per kg body weight), Steviol Glycosides (E960) 2 mg/g (Maximum daily intake: 4 mg per kg body weight).
â­ Anti-caking agent: Calcium Silicate (E341iii).

#Canderel #Stevia #SteviaSweetener #SugarAlternative #ZeroCalories #Health #Diet #Diabetes #Sweeteners #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Indulge in the rich, decadent taste of dark chocolate with **Canderel Choco Almonds 40gm**. This premium chocolate offers a luxurious experience with very little sugar, making it the perfect choice for dessert lovers and those following a healthy diet. With its smooth texture and carefully selected ingredients, **Canderel Choco Almonds 40gm** will become your go-to healthy snack.

â­ Rich and luxurious dark chocolate taste.
â­ Smooth and delicious texture.
â­ Very low sugar content, ideal for those on a diet.
â­ Perfect for gifting and sharing.
â­ Individually wrapped to maintain freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Canderel Choco Almonds 40gm**
â­ Simply open the package and enjoy.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Canderel Choco Almonds 40gm**
â­ Almonds (33%)
â­ Sweeteners
â­ Milk Powder
â­ Cocoa Butter
â­ Cocoa Mass
â­ Fiber
â­ Concentrated Butter
â­ Soy Lecithin

description_en:
Enjoy natural sweetness with **Canderel Stevia Sweetener 50 Sachets**. Made from pure stevia leaf extracts, it gives you the sweet taste you love without calories or guilt. These individually wrapped sachets of **Canderel Stevia Sweetener 50 Sachets** are perfect for adding to your tea, coffee, juices, or any favorite drink for instant sweetness and great taste. Suitable for the whole family and especially for diabetics.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Canderel Stevia Sweetener 50 Sachets**:
â­ Use one sachet of **Canderel Stevia Sweetener 50 Sachets** in your daily cup of tea, coffee, or any other beverage for instant sweetness.
â­ Each sachet contains only 0.4 calories, equivalent to the sweetness of 2.5 teaspoons of sugar.
â­ Ideal for diabetics.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Canderel Stevia Sweetener 50 Sachets**:
â­ Sweeteners: Maltitol 975.6 mg/g, Steviol Glycosides 2 mg/g.
â­ Anti-caking agent: Calcium Silicate.

description_en:
Achieve healthy, revitalized hair with the **Kanechom Moisturize & Repair Hair Mask With Argan 500g**. This innovative Brazilian product offers intense conditioning and comprehensive repair for damaged hair, leaving it soft, shiny, and deeply nourished from the first use. The blend of Argan and Elixir of special oils works to restore hair strength and vitality, renewing essential proteins and amino acids for hair health. The **Kanechom Moisturize & Repair Hair Mask With Argan 500g** is a vegan product free from sulfates, salts, parabens, and paraffins, and is completely safe for keratin and protein-treated hair, without affecting hair color. It also nourishes the scalp and promotes healthy hair growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Moisturize & Repair Hair Mask With Argan 500g**:
â­ Wash your hair and gently towel dry.
â­ Divide your hair into sections to ensure even distribution of the mask.
â­ Apply the mask from roots to ends, focusing on the most damaged areas.
â­ Comb through your hair with your fingers to ensure the mask reaches all strands.
â­ Cover your hair with a plastic shower cap for 30-40 minutes to enhance the mask's effectiveness.
â­ Rinse your hair with water only after the recommended time.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Moisturize & Repair Hair Mask With Argan 500g**:
â­ Argan Oil: Rich in unsaturated fatty acids (Omega 3 & 9) and Vitamin E.

description_en:
Achieve healthy, strong hair with **Kanechom Strength & Power Shampoo Biotin & Jaborandi 350ml**. This Brazilian vegan product is enriched with Jaborandi extract and Biotin, a balanced formula that visibly increases hair density and deeply nourishes the scalp. Biotin strengthens the scalp's natural protective barrier, maintaining its natural moisture and preventing dryness, flaking, and excessive oil secretion, while also facilitating hair combing. Thanks to its proteins and amino acids, **Kanechom Strength & Power Shampoo Biotin & Jaborandi 350ml** enhances hair elasticity and strength, giving you longer, denser, and softer hair strands. It is free from parabens, sulfates, salts, and animal derivatives, making it an ideal choice even for protein and keratin-treated hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Strength & Power Shampoo Biotin & Jaborandi 350ml**:
â­ Wash hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of shampoo and gently massage the scalp to the ends for one minute.
â­ Rinse hair well with water.
â­ It is recommended to use conditioner after shampooing for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Strength & Power Shampoo Biotin & Jaborandi 350ml**:
â­ Jaborandi extract.
â­ Biotin (Vitamin B7).

#KanechomShampoo #HealthyHair #HairLoss #HairTreatment #HairCare #Biotin #Jaborandi #StrongHair #ThickHair #SaudiArabia

title_ar: ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø´ÙˆÙ… Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù„Ù„ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ ÙˆØ¹Ù„Ø§Ø¬ Ø§Ù„ØªÙ„Ù Ø¨Ø²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù† - 350Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Kanechom Moisturize & Repair Hair Shampoo with Argan oil is designed to deeply moisturize and repair damaged hair. It provides effective protection for your hair from harmful sun rays and does not affect hair dye, making it the ideal choice for dry and weak hair. It also helps to open the scalp pores to promote healthy hair growth. Kanechom products are natural Brazilian formulations, rich in argan and special oils that nourish and moisturize the scalp.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom**:
â­ Apply the shampoo to wet hair, gently massaging to create a lather.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes thoroughly with water.
â­ If irritation occurs, discontinue use.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom**:
â­ Argan: Rich in unsaturated fatty acids such as Omega 3, Omega 9, and Vitamin E.
â­ Sun Protection: Protects hair from harmful UV rays.
â­ Scalp Nourishment: Nourishes the scalp, promoting hair growth and reducing the possibility of skin inflammation and hair follicle blockage.
â­ Hair Regeneration: Helps regenerate proteins and amino acids in the hair.

#Kanechom #ArganOilShampoo #HairRepair #HairMoisture #HealthyHair #BrazilianProducts #HairCare #DryHair #HairGrowth #NaturalShampoo

description_en:
Bring your curls to life and shine with **Kanechom Curls'Taming Mask Coconut Oil & Collagen**. This Brazilian vegan product moisturizes and rejuvenates your curls from the first use, thanks to its unique blend of coconut oil and vegetable collagen that defines curls, making them soft, shiny, and mobile. **Kanechom Curls'Taming Mask Coconut Oil & Collagen** features innovative technology for smart cosmetic treatment that replenishes proteins and amino acids in the hair. It is free from sulfates, salts, parabens, and paraffin, making it safe even for hair treated with protein, keratin, or dyed hair. It deeply nourishes hair, prevents hair loss, strengthens roots, and treats damage caused by harsh chemical products. It also moisturizes dry scalp and reduces the appearance of white hair. The vegetable collagen and wheat and corn proteins in the formula help hair growth, provide smoothness and shine, and treat dry, coarse, frizzy, and color-damaged hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Curls'Taming Mask Coconut Oil & Collagen**:
â­ Wash hair and gently towel dry.
â­ Divide hair into sections to facilitate mask application.
â­ Apply the mask from roots to ends, focusing on damaged ends.
â­ Comb hair with fingers to ensure even distribution.
â­ Cover hair with a plastic shower cap for 30-40 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair with water only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Curls'Taming Mask Coconut Oil & Collagen**:
â­ Coconut Oil.
â­ Vegetable Collagen.
â­ Vegetable Wheat Protein.
â­ Corn Protein.

#Kanechom #HairMask #CoconutOil #VeganCollagen #CurlyHair #HairMoisture #HairTreatment #HealthyHair #BrazilianProducts #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Introducing the **Kanechom Moisturize & Repair Hair Conditioner with Argan 350ml**, a comprehensive solution for damaged and dry hair. Infused with natural Argan oil from Brazil, this conditioner provides the deep hydration your hair craves, promoting a healthy scalp and stimulating healthy hair growth. It effectively protects hair from sun damage, doesn't affect hair dye, making it ideal for colored hair. It also helps to open hair pores for better growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Moisturize & Repair Hair Conditioner with Argan 350ml**

â­ Apply to hair after shampooing.
â­ Leave on for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Moisturize & Repair Hair Conditioner with Argan 350ml**

â­ Argan Oil: Rich in unsaturated fatty acids like Omega 3, Omega 9, and Vitamin E.
â­ Protects hair from harmful sun rays.
â­ Nourishes the scalp, positively impacting hair growth and reducing the likelihood of issues like dermatitis and hair follicle blockage.
â­ Aids in the regeneration of proteins and amino acids.

#Kanechom #HairConditioner #ArganOil #HairMoisture #DamageRepair #HealthyHair #BrazilianProducts #HairCare #DryHair #DeepHydration

description_en:
Experience superior care with the **Kanechom Intense Care Hair Mask Shea & Castor Oil**, the ultimate solution for hair needing deep repair. This Brazilian, vegan, sulfate-free, paraben-free, and paraffin-free product restructures hair internally and externally, making it ideal for chemically treated, rubbery, or color-stripped hair. Shea butter, rich in Vitamins A & E, and castor oil work to strengthen your hair strands, deeply nourish, and moisturize from roots to ends, treating brittleness, frizz, and dandruff. **Kanechom's** innovative technology replaces proteins and amino acids without affecting dye color, making it suitable for protein and keratin-treated hair. Castor oil combats dandruff and fungi while stimulating the scalp for healthy hair growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Intense Care Hair Mask Shea & Castor Oil**:
â­ Wash hair and gently towel dry.
â­ Section hair into strands to easily distribute the mask, focusing on damaged ends.
â­ Apply the mask from roots to tips.
â­ Use your fingers to comb through hair, ensuring the mask reaches every strand.
â­ Can be used as a quick 3-minute treatment or a deep 20-minute treatment, then rinse with water.
â­ Can be used as a daily conditioner.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Intense Care Hair Mask Shea & Castor Oil**:
â­ Shea Butter: Moisturizes hair, soothes the scalp, and softens brittle hair.
â­ Castor Oil: Rich in fatty acids and Vitamin E, treats hair loss, dryness, and breakage, and fights dandruff.
â­ Vitamin A & E: For intense nourishment and natural shine.
â­ Anti-inflammatory compounds for hair thickening.
â­ Fatty acids to moisturize the scalp and reduce hair loss.

description_en:
Revitalize your hair with **Kanechom Strength & Power Hair Mask with Biotin & Jaborandi**. This Brazilian vegan mask nourishes the scalp and significantly boosts hair density. Its unique formula, infused with Jaborandi and Biotin, strengthens hair follicles, helping to reduce hair loss and prevent scalp dryness while maintaining its natural moisture. It also makes hair easier to comb and promotes scalp blood circulation, giving your hair the strength and shine it deserves.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Strength & Power Hair Mask with Biotin & Jaborandi**:
â­ Wash your hair and gently towel dry.
â­ Divide your hair into sections for easier application.
â­ Apply the mask from roots to ends, focusing on damaged tips.
â­ Use your fingers to comb through hair, ensuring the mask reaches every strand.
â­ Cover your hair with a plastic shower cap for 30-40 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair with water only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Strength & Power Hair Mask with Biotin & Jaborandi**:
â­ Jaborandi Plant: Rich in alkaloids that promote hair growth.
â­ Biotin (Vitamin B7): Strengthens the scalp's protective barrier and maintains moisture.
â­ Proteins & Amino Acids: Improve hair elasticity and strength.
â­ Free from parabens, sulfates, and salts.

#Kanechom #HairMask #HairStrengthening #HairLossTreatment #Biotin #Jaborandi #HealthyHair #BrazilianProducts #HairCare #SaudiArabia

title_ar: ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø´ÙˆÙ… Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¬Ø¹Ø¯ Ø¨Ø²ÙŠØª Ø¬ÙˆØ² Ø§Ù„Ù‡Ù†Ø¯ ÙˆØ§Ù„ÙƒÙˆÙ„Ø§Ø¬ÙŠÙ† 350 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience healthy, shiny curly hair with **Kanechom Curls'Taming Shampoo Coconut Oil & Collagen 350ml**. This Brazilian vegan product, free from salts, parabens, and paraffin, embodies Brazilian industry quality. Its unique formula moisturizes and protects wavy hair strands for enhanced density and supreme beauty, helping to maintain the perfect hair shape. The blend of plant collagen with coconut oil provides superior hydration and nourishment, making hair shiny and healthy, preventing hair loss, and strengthening roots. **Kanechom Curls'Taming Shampoo Coconut Oil & Collagen 350ml** treats hair damage caused by harsh chemicals, aids in dandruff treatment, and moisturizes dry scalps. It imparts smoothness and shine, treating dry and coarse hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Curls'Taming Shampoo Coconut Oil & Collagen 350ml**:
â­ Apply a suitable amount to wet hair.
â­ Massage the scalp for 3-5 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Curls'Taming Shampoo Coconut Oil & Collagen 350ml**:
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Plant Collagen
â­ Wheat Protein
â­ Corn Protein

#Kanechom #CurlyHairShampoo #CoconutOil #PlantCollagen #HairCare #HealthyHair #BrazilianProducts #ShinyHair #NoHairLoss #HairMoisture

description_en:
Discover the secret to healthy, revitalized hair with the **Kanechom Hair Mask Restore & Protect 500 ml**. This innovative mask is specially designed for damaged and split ends, providing deep hydration and comprehensive repair. Thanks to its rich formula infused with ceramides and amino acids, the **Kanechom Hair Mask Restore & Protect 500 ml** boosts your hair's resilience, restoring its natural vitality and shine.

â­ **Product Features:**
â­ Deep repair for damaged and brittle hair with amino acids and ceramides.
â­ Superior hydration for ultimate softness and complete hair health.
â­ Strengthens hair structure and reduces breakage, helping to minimize hair loss.
â­ Imparts a long-lasting natural shine and vitality.
â­ Sulfate- and paraben-free formula.
â­ Suitable for all hair types, especially dry and damaged hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Hair Mask Restore & Protect 500 ml**
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to clean, damp hair.
â­ Gently massage from roots to ends.
â­ Leave on for 10-15 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Recommended for use once or twice a week for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Hair Mask Restore & Protect 500 ml**
â­ Contains a blend of essential amino acids for hair repair.
â­ Enriched with ceramides to boost moisture barrier and strengthen hair strands.
â­ Effective natural ingredients that deeply nourish the scalp and hair.

Discover the beauty of your hair with **Kanechom** Curl Taming Conditioner, specially formulated for curly, dry, and damaged hair. Infused with coconut oil and plant-based collagen, it delivers deep hydration and a healthy shine to your locks, while helping to strengthen roots and mend split ends. This natural Brazilian conditioner is rich in wheat and corn proteins that promote hair growth and impart superior smoothness. Whether your hair is naturally curly or has suffered from chemical treatments, **Kanechom** is the ultimate solution to revitalize your mane.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to damp hair.
â­ Leave it on for two to three minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom**:
â­ Coconut Oil for deep nourishment.
â­ Plant-based Collagen for hair strengthening and growth enhancement.
â­ Wheat and Corn Protein for increased smoothness and shine.

â­ Grants vitality to hair roots, strengthening and revitalizing them.

â­ Stimulates blood circulation in hair follicles to promote growth.
â­ Biotin (Vitamin B7) stimulates cell growth and increases amino acids for hair strengthening.
â­ Enhances blood flow to the scalp to strengthen circulation and overall hair strength.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Strength & Power Conditioner with Biotin & Jaborandi**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to hair after shampooing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Strength & Power Conditioner with Biotin & Jaborandi**:
â­ Biotin (Vitamin B7) for cell growth stimulation.
â­ Jaborandi with its active alkaline compounds like Pilocarpine.

description_en:
Achieve beautifully sleek and manageable hair with **Kanechom Shampoo** Straight Effect 350 ml. This shampoo gently cleanses your hair while effectively minimizing the frizz effect, leaving it with exceptional smoothness and control. Enriched with Vegetable Keratin and D-Panthenol, **Kanechom Shampoo** realigns hair fibers, resulting in a glossy and healthy appearance. Perfect for hair that needs extra hydration and frizz elimination. Discover the secret to smooth, flowing locks with every wash.

â­ Long-lasting, disciplined smoothness.
â­ Superior hair shielding and effective anti-frizz action.
â­ Imparts healthy shine and an attractive look.
â­ Easy to use and suitable for all hair types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Shampoo**:
â­ Apply **Kanechom Shampoo** to wet hair, massaging gently to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Repeat the process for best results.
â­ For optimal straightening effect, it is recommended to use the complete Kanechom line.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Shampoo**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamide DEA, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Parfum, Dimethiconol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Triethanolamine, Linalool, Panthenol, TEA-Dodecylbenzene Sulfonate, Poloxamer 338.
â­ Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Methylchloroisothiazolinone / Methylisothiazolinone, DMDM Hydantoin.
â­ *Complex K: Glycerin, Zea Mays Starch, Hydrolyzed Ceratonia Siliqua Seed Extract, Polyquaternium-16, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-7.
â­ Active ingredients: Vegetable Keratin, D â€“ Panthenol and K Complex for deep hair nourishment.

#KanechomShampoo #SleekHair #FrizzControl #HairSmoothness #HairHydration #SaudiHaircare #JeddahBeauty #HealthyHair #HairKeratin #RiyadhCosmetics

description_en:
Introducing the **Kanechom** Hair Mask Straight Effect, your secret to achieving incredibly smooth and brilliantly shiny hair. This 500 gm powerhouse works deep to nourish, repair damage, and leave your hair effortlessly manageable and healthier than ever.

âœ¨ Indulge your hair with the ultimate care experience from **Kanechom** Hair Mask and unlock an irresistible, healthy, and captivating look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom** Hair Mask:
â­ Wash hair with shampoo and towel dry until damp.
â­ Apply the mask from roots to ends.
â­ Leave on for 20 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom** Hair Mask:
â­ Botanical Keratin: Strengthens hair and reduces frizz.
â­ Argan Oil: Provides deep hydration and enhanced shine.
â­ Avocado Oil: Nourishes hair for a silky-smooth finish.

title_ar: ÙƒØ§Ù†Ø´ÙˆÙ… Ù…Ø§Ø³Ùƒ Ø§ØµÙ„Ø§Ø­ ÙˆÙ†Ø¹ÙˆÙ…Ø© Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙÙˆØ§ÙƒÙ‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø´ÙƒÙ„Ø© 500Ø¬
description_en: Give your hair the ultimate care it deserves with the **Kanechom Revitalization Hair Mask Mix Fruit 500g**. This luxurious Brazilian vegetable mask, free from sulfates, parabens, and paraffin, nourishes your hair with a rich and concentrated blend of natural fruits. It deeply penetrates hair strands, leaving them exceptionally soft and brilliantly lustrous, while also working to restore dry and damaged hair. It features a refreshing scent and contains a potent mix of yogurt and honey, avocado rich in healthy fats for moisture and vitality, and soy protein that boosts keratin and moisturizes the scalp. Additionally, it includes blackberries to promote hair length, 19 essential amino acids for hair nourishment, and 21 vital vitamins, most importantly Vitamin A, to enhance hair growth. Cranberries add essential nutrients like Omega 3, 6, and 9, and Vitamin E for strong, healthy hair, while banana reduces hair frizz and smooths it, and cherry treats scalp issues like itching and dandruff thanks to its richness in vitamins and minerals.

Begin your hair's revitalizing journey with **Kanechom Shampoo**, specifically designed to offer effective cleansing, a refreshing scent, and superior hydration. It helps impart exceptional softness and noticeable shine to your hair. Restore your hair's strength and radiance with this innovative formula. Ideal for damaged or chemically treated hair, **Kanechom Shampoo** provides the protection your hair needs.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ Intense hair restoration from roots to tips.
â­ Provides superior softness and healthy shine.
â­ Offers strong protection against damage and external factors.
â­ Strengthens weak and brittle hair, restoring its vitality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Shampoo**:

description_en:
Discover the transformative power of **Kanechom Conditioner Straight Effect** 350 ml, designed to deliver exceptional conditioning and prolonged smoothness. This advanced formula works to deeply moisturize your hair and provide long-lasting softness, leaving it with a healthy and radiant appearance.

Enriched with Vegetable Keratin and D-Panthenol, **Kanechom Conditioner Straight Effect** realigns hair strands, ensuring they are soft, disciplined, and completely frizz-free. Experience beautifully managed hair that is smooth and free from tangles.

**Product Features:**
â­ Prolonged and disciplined smoothness.
â­ Effective shielding and anti-frizz protection.
â­ Restores vitality and natural shine to your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Conditioner Straight Effect**
â­ After shampooing, apply the conditioner evenly to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage into the strands to ensure thorough distribution.
â­ Leave on for a few minutes, then rinse well with water.
â­ For optimal results, use the complete **Kanechom** product line.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Conditioner Straight Effect**
â­ Active Ingredients: Vegetable Keratin, Dâ€“Panthenol, and K Complex.
â­ K Complex provides intelligent hair nourishment.
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Lactic Acid, Cetyl Palmitate, Parfum, Dimethicone, Linalool, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Methylchloroisothiazolinone / Methylisothiazolinone, *K Complex: Glycerin, Zea Mays Starch, Hydrolyzed Ceratonia Siliqua Seed Extract, Polyquaternium-16, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-7.

title_en: Kanechom Vitamin C 3 x 1 Hair Mask 500 ml
title_ar: ÙƒØ§Ù†ÙŠØ´ÙˆÙ… Ù…Ø§Ø³Ùƒ ÙÙŠØªØ§Ù…ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙŠ 3 Ã— 1 Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± 500 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Revitalize your hair with the power of Vitamin C! Introducing the **Kanechom Vitamin C 3 x 1 Hair Mask 500 ml**, the versatile formula that works as a conditioner, moisturizer, and styling cream. Rich in nutrients, it promotes hair growth and strengthening, while Vitamin C acts as an antioxidant to combat hair aging and boost collagen production for healthy, beautiful hair. Micellar water purifies your hair, leaving it with unparalleled brightness!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Kanechom Vitamin C 3 x 1 Hair Mask 500 ml**:
â­ As a Conditioner: After washing your hair, apply the **Kanechom Vitamin C 3 x 1 Hair Mask 500 ml** and gently massage for 2 minutes, then rinse.
â­ For Hydration: Apply strand by strand and let it sit for 30 minutes, then rinse.
â­ As a Combing Cream: Apply to wet or dry hair and distribute evenly for perfect styling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Kanechom Vitamin C 3 x 1 Hair Mask 500 ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, DMDM Hydantoin, Parfum, Ethylhexylglycerin, D-Limonene, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Citric Acid, Corn Glycerides, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Sorbitol, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Butylene Glycol, Citral, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Aspartic Acid, Proline, Valine, Glutamic Acid, Phenylalanine, Glycine, Decyl Glucoside, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Arginine, Serine, Leucine, Histidine, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Disodium EDTA, Glycerin, Lysine, PEG-400, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Cysteine, Tryptophan, Ammonium Lactate.
â­ Active Ingredients: Micellar Water, Collagen, and Vitamin C.

#HairMask #VitaminC #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairMoisture #HairNutrition #HairGrowth #ShinyHair #SaudiBeauty #Kanechom

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness with **Creme 21 Glycerin Oil Moisturizer 200ml**. This superior moisturizer delivers deep skin hydration thanks to its rich formula of glycerin and nourishing oils. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly, leaving your skin feeling smooth, soft, and nourished. Perfect for daily use, especially for dry skin, it revitalizes and provides a refreshing feel throughout the day.

Product Features:
â­ Combines glycerin and nourishing oils to deeply hydrate and moisturize the skin.
â­ Lightweight formula absorbs quickly, leaving skin feeling smooth and soft.
â­ Perfect for daily use, especially for dry skin, providing long-lasting moisture and nourishment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21 Glycerin Oil Moisturizer**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use regularly for hydrated, nourished, and smooth skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21 Glycerin Oil Moisturizer**:
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Vegetable Oils.
â­ Water (Aqua).
â­ Fragrance (Parfum).
â­ Other ingredients as per the product variant.

description_en:
Experience healthy, radiant skin with **Cream 21 Body Lotion - Ultra Dry Skin**. This lotion is specifically formulated to provide deep nourishment for very dry skin, restoring its softness and elasticity. Enriched with Almond Oil and Vitamin E, **Cream 21 Body Lotion** works to replenish the skin's natural moisture and protect it from dryness and harmful environmental effects. Enjoy a smooth, creamy texture that absorbs quickly, leaving your skin moisturized and refreshed all day long. It's the perfect solution for the daily care of your extremely dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Body Lotion - Ultra Dry Skin**:
â­ Open the bottle flap and squeeze out the required amount of product.
â­ Apply it directly over your body.
â­ Gently massage until the lotion is fully absorbed into your skin.
â­ Use regularly for softer, smoother skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Body Lotion - Ultra Dry Skin**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)
â­ Other natural oils.

description_en:
Experience deep hydration with **Creme 21** Intensive Moisture Boost Petroleum Jelly (300ml). Specially formulated for dry and rough skin, this rich jelly deeply nourishes your skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and moisturized for hours. Its unique formula creates a protective barrier that locks in moisture, preventing dryness and ensuring healthy, protected skin all day long. Perfect for daily care, it provides a feeling of comfort and freshness.

â­ Deeply hydrates and nourishes dry, rough skin.
â­ Provides long-lasting moisture and prevents dryness.
â­ Forms a protective barrier that locks in moisture.
â­ Suitable for daily use on all skin areas.
â­ Leaves skin soft, smooth, and healthy-looking.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21**:
â­ Apply a generous amount of **Creme 21** Petroleum Jelly to dry or rough areas of your skin.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use regularly for best results and continuous hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21**:
â­ Petrolatum (Petroleum Jelly)
â­ Paraffin
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Other ingredients for intensive hydration.

description_en:
Bid farewell to ultra-dry skin with the new **Cream 21 Body Lotion For Normal Skin**, designed to provide deep hydration and daily care for soft, radiant skin. Enriched with Pro-Vitamin B5, it soothes the skin and reduces irritation, making it ideal for daily use on the face, neck, and body. Its lightweight, non-greasy texture absorbs quickly, leaving skin smooth and silky with long-lasting protection. Aloe vera essence acts as a natural protective layer to restore moisture. Enjoy freshness and a gentle fragrance that nourishes your skin and gives it a healthy glow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Body Lotion For Normal Skin**:
â­ Gently apply the lotion to the face and body.
â­ Allow a few minutes for complete absorption for soft and smooth skin.
â­ Use daily to maintain skin hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Body Lotion For Normal Skin**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5)
â­ Aloe Vera Extract
â­ Vitamin B5
â­ Other natural ingredients for deep hydration and protection.

description_en:
The most recommended way to treat ultra-dry skin is to have a great body lotion in your daily routine, and **Cream 21 Lotion Ultra Dry Skin 600 ml** is the perfect find for it. Naturally packed with healing and anti-inflammatory properties, and enriched with Vitamin E, **Cream 21 Lotion Ultra Dry Skin 600 ml** penetrates deep into your skin layers to heal dryness. You will notice a remarkable transformation towards tender and soft-to-touch skin. Its rich, creamy formula provides intensive and gentle nourishment, absorbing quickly to leave your skin feeling supple and hydrated all day. Dermatologically approved, it moisturizes and prevents dehydration, making it an essential part of your skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Lotion Ultra Dry Skin 600 ml**:
â­ Take one or more pumps of the body lotion into your palm.
â­ Gently massage onto your desired areas of skin until fully absorbed.
â­ Enjoy instantly supple and moisturized skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Lotion Ultra Dry Skin 600 ml**:
â­ Natural Almond Oil: For deep hydration and dryness relief.
â­ Vitamin E: To nourish the skin and improve its texture.
â­ Aqua (Water), Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Glycerin, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Propylene Glycol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Ceteareth-30, Dimethicone, Tocopheryl Acetate, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Cocoglycerides, Lactic Acid, Cetyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Potassium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Propylparaben, Methylparaben, Parfum (Fragrance), Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Citronellol, Eugenol.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Cream 21**, the intensive moisturizing cream designed to give your body and extremities the superior care it deserves. **Cream 21** leaves your skin silky smooth and moisturized all day long thanks to its advanced formula, rich in Vitamin E and Almond Oil.

â­ **Natural Ingredients:** Enriched with Vitamin E, Pro-Vitamin E5, and Almond Oil, it works to combat free radicals and delay the signs of aging.
â­ **Deep Skin Care:** Penetrates deeply to keep your skin hydrated from within, protecting its upper layers.
â­ **Long-Lasting Moisturization:** Apply in the morning and enjoy hydrated, protected skin all day without needing reapplication.
â­ **Compact & Portable:** A practical and compact package that easily fits into your handbag, making it your perfect on-the-go companion.
â­ **Suitable for All Skin Types:** With its pH-balanced formula and absence of harmful ingredients.
â­ **Dermatologically Tested:** Completely safe for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21**
â­ Cleanse the area you wish to moisturize and ensure it is dry.
â­ Take an adequate amount of cream onto your palm.
â­ Gently massage the cream onto the skin with your fingertips until fully absorbed.
â­ Use regularly for best results and smooth, healthy-looking skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21**
â­ Aqua (Water), Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Glyceryl Stearate Se, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Octyldodecanol, Potassium Palmitate, Potassium Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond Oil), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin E5), Parfum (Fragrance), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citral, Citronellol, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben.

#Cream21 #Moisturizer #VitaminE #SkinCare #BodyLotion #Hydration #HealthySkin #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #SkincareRoutine

description_en:
Experience superior softness and hydration with **Creme 21 Hydrating Delight Body Wash**. This sulfate-free body wash gently cleanses your skin while maintaining its natural moisture balance. Its nourishing formula deeply hydrates, leaving your skin feeling soft, smooth, and refreshed. Suitable for all skin types, **Creme 21 Hydrating Delight Body Wash** offers a refreshing shower experience without drying out your skin, revealing a radiant and healthy complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21 Hydrating Delight Body Wash**:
â­ Apply a small amount to a loofah or your hands.
â­ Lather and massage onto wet skin in a circular motion.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water to reveal soft, hydrated skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21 Hydrating Delight Body Wash**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Citric Acid

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Creme 21 Rich & Creamy Body Wash**, specially formulated to provide a luxurious shower experience. This body wash nourishes and hydrates the skin with a non-drying pH-balanced formula, enriched with Vitamin E and Almond Oil, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and deeply moisturized.

Vitamin E in **Creme 21 Rich & Creamy Body Wash** acts as a potent antioxidant that helps protect the skin from environmental damage and offers profound nourishment. Almond Oil also contributes to locking in moisture, providing a youthful, healthy appearance without any dryness. Enjoy healthy and radiant skin with every use.

â­ Sulfate-free formula for gentle and effective cleansing.
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E and Almond Oil for superior hydration and nourishment.
â­ pH-balanced formula, suitable for all skin types.
â­ Leaves skin soft, smooth, and refreshed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21 Rich & Creamy Body Wash**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to a wet loofah or your hands.
â­ Gently lather and massage onto damp skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water for clean, refreshed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21 Rich & Creamy Body Wash**:
â­ Vitamin E for skin nourishment and protection.
â­ Almond Oil to maintain moisture and elasticity.
â­ pH-balanced formula, gentle on the skin.

#Creme21 #BodyWash #SkinHydration #Skincare #VitaminE #AlmondOil #SoftSkin #SaudiArabia #BodyCare #BeautyProducts

description_en:
Give your skin the care it deserves with **Creme 21** Intensive Moisturising Petroleum Jelly. This superior product deeply hydrates and nourishes dry skin, leaving it feeling soft and silky smooth with long-lasting effects. Its unique formula creates an effective protective barrier that locks in moisture, preventing dryness and ensuring continuous hydration even in the harshest conditions. **Creme 21** is your ideal choice for daily care of rough, dry skin, providing intensive moisture and ultimate protection for healthier, more vibrant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21**:

â­ Apply a generous amount of **Creme 21** Petroleum Jelly to dry or rough areas of the skin.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use regularly for long-lasting moisture and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21**:

â­ Petrolatum.
â­ Paraffin.
â­ Fragrance (Parfum).
â­ Other ingredients as per the product variant.

description_en:
Pamper your skin with **Cream 21 Cream Vitamin E 250 ml**. Dermatologically approved and cruelty-free, this moisturizing cream is enriched with almond oil and pro-vitamin B5 for deep, all-day hydration. Its light, fast-absorbing formula is suitable for all skin types and helps maintain a neutral pH balance. Free from micro-plastics, silicones, paraffin, and parabens, it ensures gentle skin compatibility. Use twice daily on face and body for supple, radiant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Cream Vitamin E 250 ml**:
â­ Prep your skin for maximum benefit.
â­ After showering, pat your skin dry.
â­ Take a small amount of cream in your palm and apply generously all over the body and face.
â­ For best results, use the cream twice a day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Cream Vitamin E 250 ml**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)
â­ Free from Micro-plastics, Parabens, Silicones, and Paraffin

#Cream21 #VitaminE #AlmondOil #SoftSkin #Moisturizer #Skincare #SaudiBeauty #Hydration #BodyCare #BeautyTips

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Creme 21 Petal Whisper Deodorant Roll On**, 50ml. It offers powerful protection against sweat and body odor, blended with a soft floral scent that lasts for hours. Its unique formula provides confidence and dryness throughout the day, while caring for your underarm skin to keep it smooth and refreshed. Enjoy a deodorant experience that combines effectiveness with gentleness, with a touch of floral elegance. Choose **Creme 21 Petal Whisper Deodorant Roll On** for a fresh look and unparalleled protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21 Petal Whisper Deodorant Roll On**:
â­ Gently shake the bottle before each use.
â­ Apply the roll-on deodorant to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow it to dry completely before dressing to ensure all-day effectiveness.
â­ Avoid applying to irritated or broken skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21 Petal Whisper Deodorant Roll On**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid

shortdescription_en: Enjoy long-lasting floral freshness with Creme 21 Petal Whisper Deodorant Roll On 50ml. Effective protection and superior care for your skin.

title_en: Cream 21 Vitamin E & Almond Oil Moisturizing Cream - 150 ml
title_ar: ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… 21 Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø¨ÙÙŠØªØ§Ù…ÙŠÙ† Ù‡Ù€ ÙˆØ²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ù„ÙˆØ² - 150 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience superior skin nourishment with **Cream 21**, the perfect moisturizer for all skin types. Enriched with Vitamin E to combat premature aging and nourishing Almond Oil, this cream leaves your skin feeling soft, refreshed, and hydrated all day long. Its gentle formula, free from artificial colors, is dermatologically tested to be kind to your skin and maintain its neutral pH balance. **Cream 21** is the ideal choice for preserving skin moisture and protecting it from dryness, making it an essential part of your daily skincare routine. Made in Germany to ensure the highest quality and original ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21**:
â­ Shower with your favorite cleanser and rinse your body thoroughly with water.
â­ Gently pat your skin dry with a clean, soft towel.
â­ Take an adequate amount of moisturizer into your palms and gently massage it onto your skin in circular or upward motions.
â­ Apply from top to toe, concentrating on dry areas like knees and elbows.
â­ Allow the moisturizer to absorb into the skin for one minute.
â­ Re-apply the moisturizer as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21**:
â­ Vitamin E (anti-premature aging)
â­ Almond Oil (nourishing and moisturizing)
â­ Pro-Vitamin B5
â­ Gentle and pH-balanced formula
â­ Free from artificial colors and chemicals

shortdescription_en: Pamper your skin with Cream 21, rich in Vitamin E & Almond Oil. Moisturizes, protects, and leaves your skin soft and healthy all day.

title_en: Cream 21 Cream Orange M 150ml: For Youthful, Radiant Skin
title_ar: ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ…21 ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø¨Ø±ØªÙ‚Ø§Ù„ÙŠ ÙˆØ³Ø· 150 Ù…Ù„: Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø´Ø§Ø¨Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ø´Ø±Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Achieve perfect skin with **Cream 21 Cream Orange M 150ml**. Say goodbye to pimples, wrinkles, dark circles, and dryness. This natural cream works to regenerate skin cells, giving you long-lasting youthful radiance.

**Product Features:**
â­ Enriched with sunflower seeds, acting as an anti-aging agent for intensive whole-body care.
â­ Ideal for face, hands, and body, maintaining moisture all day long.
â­ Helps remove dark spots and pigmentation marks, promoting vibrant, youthful skin.
â­ Strengthens skin cells with Vitamin B5 for a natural glow.
â­ Delivers consistently radiant and glowing skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Cream Orange M 150ml**:
â­ After bathing, pat your body dry gently.
â­ Take a suitable amount of cream into your palms and apply it to the body with gentle, circular massaging movements to enhance absorption.
â­ You can apply more cream as needed.
â­ Apply the cream to your face, neck, hands, and legs.
â­ Let it sit for a moment to allow the skin to fully absorb its benefits.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Cream Orange M 150ml**:
â­ Aqua.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Petrolatum.
â­ Citral.
â­ Paraffinum liquidum.
â­ Polyglyceryl-2 dipolyhydroxystearate.
â­ Zinc stearate.
â­ Panthenol.
â­ Isopropyl palmitate.
â­ Sucrose distearate.
â­ Citric acid.
â­ Magnesium sulfate.
â­ Glyceryl oleate.
â­ Hydrogenated palm glycerides citrate.
â­ Tocopherol.
â­ Linalool.
â­ Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Methylparaben.
â­ Ethylparaben.
â­ Butylparaben.
â­ Parfum.
â­ Hexyl cinnamal.
â­ Limonene.
â­ Hydroxyisohexyl 3-cyclohexene carboxaldehyde (lyral).
â­ Citronellol.
â­ Butylphenyl methylpropional (lilial).
â­ Alpha-isomethyl ionone.

description_en:
Experience lasting freshness and confidence with **Creme 21 Beloved Breeze**, the roll-on deodorant expertly crafted to provide superior protection against body odor for up to 24 hours. Enjoy a refreshing floral scent that accompanies you throughout the day, while its innovative formula ensures easy and even application, keeping your skin dry and comfortable. **Creme 21 Beloved Breeze** is gentle on the skin, effectively nourishing the underarm area to leave it feeling smooth and revitalized. Maintain your elegance and freshness with your ultimate daily care choice.

â­ Effective, long-lasting protection against body odor.
â­ Refreshing floral fragrance for all-day freshness.
â­ Smooth and even application with the roll-on formula.
â­ Gentle on the skin, helping to moisturize and nourish.
â­ Leaves underarms feeling soft and dry.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21 Beloved Breeze**:
â­ Gently shake the bottle before use to ensure ingredient uniformity.
â­ Apply the deodorant to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing to ensure maximum effectiveness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21 Beloved Breeze**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Aluminium Chlorohydrate
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Citric Acid

description_en:
Experience reliable protection and all-day freshness with **Creme 21 Deodorant Roll On Fresh Fusion 50 ml**. This product offers superior 48-hour protection against odor and sweat, enhanced with a refreshing aquatic fragrance that provides a sensation of continuous cleanliness and freshness. Its gentle formula, enriched with skin-friendly ingredients, makes it ideal for all skin types, even sensitive ones, as it soothes and cares for the skin without causing any irritation. The easy-to-use roll-on bottle design ensures precise product application, making it the perfect companion for on-the-go freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21 Deodorant Roll On Fresh Fusion 50 ml**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use to ensure even product distribution.
â­ Gently roll the deodorant onto the underarm area, covering the entire area with a thin layer.
â­ Allow the product to dry for a few moments before dressing.
â­ Use daily for long-lasting protection and freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21 Deodorant Roll On Fresh Fusion 50 ml**:
â­ A blend of skin-friendly ingredients that provide effective protection.
â­ Moisturizers that help soothe and care for the skin.
â­ A refreshing aquatic fragrance that provides a feeling of cleanliness.

description_en:
Experience intensely hydrated and smooth skin with **Creme 21** Petroleum Jelly Intensive Moisturizing (300ml). It deeply nourishes and hydrates dry skin, leaving it soft and silky. Its rich formula creates a protective barrier that locks in moisture, preventing dryness and providing long-lasting hydration. Ideal for daily use on rough, dry skin, it ensures intensive moisture and protection for healthier-looking skin.

â­ Enriched with cocoa butter for deep moisture and a soothing fragrance.
â­ Forms a protective barrier that locks in moisture and prevents skin dryness.
â­ Ideal for daily use to keep skin soft, smooth, and hydrated.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to dry or rough areas of the skin.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use regularly for long-lasting moisture and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21**:
â­ Petrolatum, Paraffin, Fragrance (Parfum), and other ingredients as per the product variant.

description_en:
Revitalize your skin with **Creme 21** Aloe Vera Fresh Moisturizing Jelly. This unique product provides your skin with the deep hydration it deserves, thanks to its rich formula of aloe vera and petroleum jelly. **Creme 21** works to soothe dry and irritated skin, while also forming a protective barrier that locks in moisture, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and refreshed all day long. Ideal for dry or rough areas, this jelly offers long-lasting moisture and helps prevent future dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21**:

â­ Apply a small amount of **Creme 21** Aloe Vera Fresh Moisturizing Jelly to dry or rough areas of your skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use regularly for soft, hydrated, and smooth skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21**:

â­ Petrolatum.
â­ Aloe Vera Extract for instant soothing and hydration.
â­ Refreshing Fragrance (Parfum).
â­ Other ingredients ensuring effectiveness and softness.

Bid farewell to rough skin with the new **Cream 21 Body Lotion for Normal Skin**, providing high moisturization for daily care of soft, radiant skin. Enriched with Pro-Vitamin B5, it soothes and deeply softens the skin, making it ideal for daily care of normal and dry skin. Its non-greasy, non-sticky formula absorbs easily and offers long-lasting nourishment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Body Lotion for Normal Skin**:
â­ Apply gently on face and body for soft and smooth skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Body Lotion for Normal Skin**:
â­ Aqua (Water)

â­ Other natural ingredients for skin hydration and protection.

title_en: Cream 21 Body Lotion For Dry Skin 400 ml
title_ar: ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ…21 Ù„ÙˆØ´Ù† Ù„Ù„Ø¬Ø³Ù… Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø§ÙØ© 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Bid farewell to rough skin with the new **Cream 21 Body Lotion for Dry Skin** which ensures a high moisturizing effect for daily care, leaving your skin feeling soft and radiant. Enriched with Pro-Vitamin B5, this lotion helps to soothe dryness and make skin smooth and silky. It absorbs easily, protects your skin from damage, and acts as a natural anti-inflammatory product to deeply calm your skin.

**Cream 21 Body Lotion** is one of the most effective and best-quality moisturizing lotions for daily care of both normal and dry skin. It is enriched with Pro-Vitamin B5, which cares for and protects the skin, making it supple, smooth, and gentle. It improves skin barrier function and provides deep moisturization, while the essence of aloe vera acts as a protective layer to help restore moisture.

**Cream 21 Body Lotion** preserves your skin's hydration, making it appear soft and glowing, and comes with a pleasantly warm fragrance. Its non-greasy, non-sticky texture spreads easily, absorbs quickly, and offers long-lasting nourishment. Dermatologically approved for skin compatibility, it's a healthy, intensive moisturizing cream that can be used on the face, neck, hands, and entire body to repair dry skin and enhance its natural glow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Body Lotion**
â­ Apply gently on face and body for soft and smooth skin.
â­ Ensure it rests for a bit so that it is properly absorbed by the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Body Lotion**
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Triceteareth-4 Phosphate
â­ Hydrogenated Vegetable Glycerides
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Ceteareth-12
â­ Panthenol
â­ Cetearyl Alcohol
â­ Carbomer
â­ Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Methylparaben
â­ Ethylparaben
â­ Parfum
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool
â­ Citronellol
â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional (Lilial)
â­ Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde (Lyral)
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Citral

description_en:
Achieve ultra-soft and hydrated skin with **Creme 21 Glycerin Oil Moisturizer**. This rich formula, infused with glycerin and nourishing oils, deeply hydrates and noticeably softens your skin. Its lightweight texture absorbs quickly, leaving your skin feeling smooth, soft, and nourished. Perfect for daily use, **Creme 21 Glycerin Oil Moisturizer** revitalizes dry skin, providing long-lasting hydration and a refreshed sensation.

Product Features:
â­ Combines glycerin and nourishing oils for deep skin hydration and softening.
â­ Lightweight formula absorbs quickly, leaving skin instantly smooth and soft.
â­ Ideal for daily use, especially for dry skin, to provide long-lasting moisture and nourishment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21 Glycerin Oil Moisturizer**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use regularly for hydrated, nourished, and smooth skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21 Glycerin Oil Moisturizer**:
â­ Glycerin and Vegetable Oils.
â­ Water (Aqua) and Fragrance (Parfum).
â­ Other ingredients as per product variant.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Cream 21 Lotion**, specially formulated for normal skin, providing deep hydration and all-day protection. Enjoy soft, supple, and healthy skin with every application.

â­ Rich and nourishing formula for superior skin softness.
â­ Long-lasting hydration for up to 24 hours.
â­ Suitable for daily use on all body areas.
â­ Quickly absorbed without a greasy residue.
â­ Enhances skin elasticity and protects against dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Lotion**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Best used after showering for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Lotion**:
â­ Glycerin: Helps retain moisture in the skin.
â­ Vitamin E: An antioxidant that protects the skin.
â­ Olive Oil: Deeply moisturizes and nourishes the skin.
â­ Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Paraffinum Liquidum, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Ceteareth-20, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Vitamin E, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil.

description_en:
Experience ultimate hydration with **Creme 21** Intensive Moisturizing Petroleum Jelly (100ml), specially formulated to deeply hydrate and nourish dry skin, leaving it feeling soft and smooth. Its rich formula creates a protective barrier that locks in moisture, preventing dryness and providing long-lasting hydration for healthier-looking skin. It's the perfect choice for daily use on rough, dry skin, ensuring it stays soft, smooth, and protected.

â­ Enriched with cocoa butter for deep moisture and a soothing fragrance.
â­ Forms a protective barrier that locks in moisture and prevents skin dryness.
â­ Ideal for daily use on dry, rough skin.
â­ Leaves your skin exceptionally soft and hydrated.
â­ Protects skin and maintains its health and vitality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Creme 21**:

â­ Apply a generous amount of Petroleum Jelly - Cocoa Rich to dry or rough areas of the skin.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Use regularly for long-lasting moisture and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Creme 21**:

â­ Petrolatum.
â­ Paraffin.
â­ Fragrance.
â­ Other ingredients as per the product variant.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Cream 21 Aloe Vera Gel**, a refreshing and nourishing treatment. Crafted with 95% pure aloe vera gel, it deeply moisturizes dry skin, protecting and aiding in its regeneration. Perfect for soothing irritated skin and leaving it feeling soft and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Aloe Vera Gel**

â­ Apply generously to dry areas of your skin.
â­ Distribute evenly and massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Enjoy instantly hydrated, smooth, and supple skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Aloe Vera Gel**

â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Aqua, Allantoin.
â­ Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, DMDM Hydantoin, Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Sodium Benzoate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Triethanolamine, Parfum.
â­ Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort with **Cream 21 Lotion Dry Skin 600 ml**. Specially formulated for dry and sensitive skin, this product provides deep hydration, alleviating itchiness and irritation caused by dryness. Enriched with natural Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, **Cream 21 Lotion Dry Skin 600 ml** works to soften your skin, leaving it with a long-lasting silky texture and restoring its natural vitality and radiance. Forget dry skin discomfort and enjoy skin that feels soft, hydrated, and protected all day long.

â­ Provides superior, long-lasting hydration for dry skin.
â­ Enriched with natural Aloe Vera and Vitamin E to promote skin health.
â­ Absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue.
â­ Dermatologically approved for safety and efficacy.
â­ Protects skin from dryness, imparting a healthy and attractive appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Lotion Dry Skin 600 ml**
â­ Squeeze the essential amount of lotion into your palm.
â­ Rub your palms together to slightly warm the lotion.
â­ Apply the lotion evenly to your skin, concentrating on dry areas.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Best used after showering for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Lotion Dry Skin 600 ml**
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil)
â­ Glycerin
â­ Cetearyl Isononanoate
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)
â­ Aloe Vera Extract (not explicitly listed but benefits mentioned)
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)

#Cream21 #DrySkinLotion #SkinHydration #Skincare #AloeVera #VitaminE #SoftSkin #DeepMoisture #DailyCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience soft, moisturized skin with **Cream 21 Body Lotion Dry Skin 250 ml**. This ideal lotion for dry skin provides deep hydration and combats annoying winter dryness with its rich formula infused with Vitamin E, Almond Oil, Aloe Vera, and Glycerin.

â­ Nourishes and moisturizes skin for up to 24 hours.
â­ Non-greasy and fast-absorbing formula.
â­ Protects skin from free radicals and delays signs of aging.
â­ Suitable for both men and women.
â­ Dermatologically tested for efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cream 21 Body Lotion Dry Skin 250 ml**

â­ Cleanse your skin thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Gently pat your skin dry with a clean towel.
â­ Take an adequate amount of lotion into your palms.
â­ Gently massage the lotion all over your body, focusing on dry and sensitive areas.
â­ Wait a few minutes before getting dressed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cream 21 Body Lotion Dry Skin 250 ml**

â­ Almond Oil
â­ Castor Seed Oil
â­ Aloe Vera
â­ Glycerin
â­ Vitamin E
â­ High-quality, non-greasy formula.
